'' mr jenkins , from greenwich , south-east london , said passengers were given the choice of disembarking at stansted or waiting an hour to fly back to gatwick . niamh slatter , from sussex , was flying from valencia , spain , when her ba flight was diverted to bournemouth . `` we were due to land 15 minutes early , but ended up circling over the south coast , '' she said . `` our attempted landing at gatwick was aborted quite late as the drone had been spotted again , so we were told that the flight was being diverted to bournemouth . '' easyjet apologised for the inconvenience , saying the circumstances were `` outside '' of the firm 's control . the uk airprox board monitors near-miss incidents . an airprox is the official term for a situation where the distance between aircraft and their relative positions and speed were such that the safety of the aircraft may have been compromised . there were 70 airprox reports involving drones coming close to aircraft over the uk in 2016 - more than double the number for 2015 . there have been 33 incidents up to may 2017 . the civil aviation authority recommends drones be flown at no higher than 400ft . however , the highest airprox involving a drone was at 12,500 ft. of the 142 airprox incidents involving drones recorded since 2010 , 40 of them were near to heathrow . six of them , up to may , had been near to gatwick . in november 2016 , the uk 's drone code was revised and updated to help pilots ensure they fly the gadgets safely . the revised code turned the five main safety tips into a mnemonic , spelling drone , to make it easier to remember . uk revises safe flying drone code the british airline pilots ' association 's flight safety specialist , steve landells , said the threat of drones flown near aircraft `` must be addressed before we see a disaster '' . `` we believe a collision , particularly with a helicopter , has the potential to be catastrophic , '' he said . the union has called for compulsory registration of drone users and said new technology should be considered , including a system where the drone transmits enough data for the police to track down the operator . the civil aviation authority said there were serious consequences for people who broke the rules when flying drones . `` drone users have to understand that when taking to the skies they are potentially flying close to one of the busiest areas of airspace in the world . '' -lsb- it is -rsb- a complex system that brings together all manner of aircraft including passenger aeroplanes , military jets , helicopters , gliders and light aircraft , '' a spokesman said . `` it is totally unacceptable to fly drones close to airports and anyone flouting the rules can face severe penalties including imprisonment . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 由于无人机被发现，盖特威克机场(Gatwick Airport)跑道关闭导致航班被迫改道，其他航班进入持续等待状态，对无人机安全的担忧增加，呼吁加强法规和技术解决方案以防止无人机与飞机发生潜在的灾难性碰撞。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 周日，机场发言人表示，由于发现了一架无人机，跑道曾两次关闭，分别为9分钟和5分钟。易捷航空表示，有四班航班被转移，而英国航空则表示有一架飞机被转移到伯恩茅斯。其他航班则采取预防措施，进入保持模式。机场表示：“在英国夏令时18:10至18:19和18:36至18:41期间，盖特威克机场的跑道操作暂停，导致少数航班被迫绕行或转移。”2016年2月，希思罗机场发生了最严重的近距离避让事件，距离为50米，这也是无人机允许接近任何人或物的最近距离。2016年，发生了70起涉及无人机的近距离避让事件，是前一年的两倍多。一位乘坐易捷航空从意大利那不勒斯飞往伦敦的乘客克雷格·詹金斯表示：“我们正在穿越英吉利海峡时，飞机开始盘旋。”他说：“飞机盘旋了四五圈……然后机长说我们要降落在斯坦斯特德。”他来自伦敦东南部的格林威治，表示乘客可以选择在斯坦斯特德下机，或者等待一个小时后返回盖特威克。来自苏塞克斯的尼安姆·斯拉特在从西班牙瓦伦西亚飞往伦敦的英国航空航班被转移到伯恩茅斯。她说：“我们原本预计提前15分钟降落，但最后在南海岸上空盘旋。”她说：“我们在盖特威克的降落被取消，因为发现了无人机，所以被告知要转移到伯恩茅斯。”易捷航空为造成的不便表示歉意，称这种情况是公司无法控制的。英国空中近距离避让委员会监测近距离避让事件。空中近距离避让是指飞机与其相对位置和速度之间的距离可能会危及飞机安全的情况。2016年，英国发生了70起涉及无人机的近距离避让事件，是2015年的两倍多。截至2017年5月，已经发生了33起事件。英国民航局建议无人机飞行高度不要超过400英尺。然而，最高的无人机近距离避让事件发生在12,500英尺高空。自2010年以来，共有142起涉及无人机的近距离避让事件，其中40起发生在希思罗附近。截至5月，有6起发生在盖特威克附近。2016年11月，英国的无人机规范被修订和更新，以帮助飞行员确保安全地操作无人机。修订后的规范将五条主要安全提示变成了一个助记词“无人机”，以便记忆。英国航空飞行员协会的飞行安全专家史蒂夫·兰德尔斯表示，无人机飞行接近飞机的威胁“必须在发生灾难之前得到解决”。他说：“我们认为，与直升机相撞，可能会造成灾难性后果。”该工会呼吁强制登记无人机用户，并表示应该考虑新技术，包括一种系统，无人机可以传输足够的数据，让警方追踪到操作者。英国民航局表示，违反无人机飞行规则的人将面临严重后果。一位发言人说：“无人机用户必须明白，当他们飞上天空时，他们可能会飞近世界上最繁忙的空域之一。”他说：“这是一个复杂的系统，汇集了各种各样的飞机，包括客机、军用喷气式飞机、直升机、滑翔机和轻型飞机。”他说：“在机场附近飞行无人机是完全不可接受的，任何违反规则的人都可能面临严重的处罚，包括监禁。”
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 盖特威克机场因发现无人机两次关闭跑道，导致航班改道或进入保持模式。英国航空公司飞行员协会呼吁加强监管和采用新技术来应对无人机对飞机的威胁。英国的无人机规范被修订和更新。

xsum.src: the possibility of brexit was one of the factors that led the us federal reserve to keep interest rates on hold , chair janet yellen said . the us central bank also said it expected a `` slower path '' for future rate rises . it raised rates in december for the first time in nearly a decade . on the 23 june uk referendum on whether to stay in the european union , ms yellen said : `` clearly this is a very important decision for the united kingdom and for europe . `` it is a decision that could have consequences for economic and financial conditions in global financial markets . `` if it does so it could have consequences in turn for the us economic outlook that would be a factor in deciding on the appropriate path of policy , '' she added . meanwhile , the us treasury cleared all bond sales on the 23 june . lou crandall , chief economist at wrightson icap , told bloomberg business that the treasury alters its auctions calendar to avoid fed monetary policy announcements , and that the uk referendum was a `` similar kind of market event '' . fed policymakers did not reveal when rates might rise , but the door has been left open for an increase when they next meet at the end of july . chair yellen added : `` proceeding cautiously and raising our interest-rate target will allow us to verify that economic growth will return to a moderate pace , that the labor market will strengthen further , and that inflation will continue to make progress toward our 2 % objective . '' the fed said in a statement that the pace of improvement in the labour market had slowed . the bank added , however , that `` economic activity will expand at a moderate pace and labour market indicators will strengthen '' even with gradual rate increases . analysis : andrew walker , bbc news the key consideration in this decision was the us jobs market - with a little help from the uncertainties arising from the forthcoming british referendum and a few other factors . we have had two months where job creation has been disappointing , especially may . the fed chair janet yellen called it `` something of a loss of momentum '' . but she also said signs there were signs that the labour market is `` approaching maximum employment '' and it 's important not to attach too much importance to one data point . she - and , she said , the fed 's policy making committee - did not feel that `` progress in the labour market has come to an end '' . which leaves us -lrb- or at least me -rrb- having to pore over the next jobs report to see how likely a rate rise is in july . at this stage it does n't look very likely , but it is not altogether off the table . the dollar fell against the euro and sterling , but wall street held on to earlier gains , with the s&p 500 up 0.3 % . the fed expected the unemployment rate to stand at 4.7 % by the end of this year , before falling to 4.6 % in 2017 and remain at that level in 2018 . in may , us job creation fell to its lowest level in more than five years , after faltering in april . ms yellen said it was important not to overreact to one or two monthly readings . `` that said , we will be watching the job market carefully , '' she added . the fed now expects the us economy to expand by only 2 % a year for the foreseeable future - slightly lower than the forecast in march . brian jacobsen of wells fargo funds management said : `` it 's as dovish as the fed can get without actually cutting rates . '' aaron kohli of bmo capital markets agreed that the statement appeared `` somewhat dovish '' , adding : `` the market had expected them to moderate their tone a little bit given what 's been going on and given the risk that we have in terms of brexit . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 由于对英国脱欧公投和就业情况不佳的担忧，美联储(US Federal Reserve)选择维持当前的利率水平。他们还预计未来升息的速度将放缓。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 美联储主席耶伦表示，英国脱欧的可能性是导致美联储维持利率不变的因素之一。美国央行还表示，预计未来加息的速度将放缓。去年12月，美联储首次在近十年来加息。在6月23日英国公投决定是否留在欧盟之际，耶伦表示：“显然，这对英国和欧洲来说是一个非常重要的决定。”她补充说，这个决定可能会对全球金融市场的经济和金融状况产生影响，进而影响美国的经济前景，这将是决定政策适当路径的一个因素。与此同时，美国财政部在6月23日清算了所有债券销售。美国莱特森ICAP的首席经济学家卢·克兰德尔告诉彭博商业频道，财政部会改变拍卖日历以避免美联储货币政策公告，而英国公投则是一个“类似的市场事件”。美联储决策者没有透露加息的时间，但留下了在7月底下次会议上加息的可能性。耶伦主席补充说：“谨慎地进行加息，将允许我们验证经济增长将恢复到适度的水平，劳动力市场将进一步加强，通胀将继续朝着我们的2%目标取得进展。”美联储在一份声明中表示，劳动力市场改善的速度已经放缓。但是，该行补充说，“经济活动将以适度的速度扩张，劳动力市场指标将加强”，即使加息步伐渐缓。BBC新闻的安德鲁·沃克分析说，这个决定的关键考虑因素是美国就业市场，还有即将到来的英国公投和其他一些因素的不确定性。过去两个月，就业增长令人失望，特别是5月份。耶伦称之为“势头的一点损失”。但她也表示，有迹象表明劳动力市场“接近最大就业水平”，重要的是不要过分重视一个数据点。她和美联储的政策制定委员会都认为“劳动力市场的进展并没有结束”。这让我们（或者至少是我）不得不仔细研究下一个就业报告，看7月加息的可能性有多大。目前看来，这个可能性不大，但也不完全排除。美元对欧元和英镑走低，但华尔街仍保持早前的涨幅，标准普尔500指数上涨0.3%。美联储预计今年年底失业率将达到4.7%，然后在2017年下降到4.6%，并在2018年保持这一水平。5月，美国就业增长降至五年来最低水平，4月也出现了疲软。耶伦表示，不要对一个或两个月的数据过度反应。“话虽如此，我们将密切关注就业市场，”她补充道。美联储现在预计未来几年美国经济每年增长2%，略低于3月的预测。富国基金管理公司的布赖恩·雅各布森表示：“这是美联储能够做到的最鸽派的做法，而不是实际上降息。”BMO资本市场的亚伦·科利也同意这一声明似乎“有些鸽派”，并补充说：“市场预计他们会在考虑到目前发生的事情和英国脱欧风险的情况下，适度调整他们的语气。”
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 美联储主席耶伦表示，英国脱欧公投是保持利率不变的重要因素。美国财政部清理债券销售，市场预计美联储将放缓加息步伐。美国就业增长放缓，但失业率保持稳定。美联储预计美国经济增长放缓，市场反应为美元下跌，股价上涨。

xsum.src: de roon moved to teesside in june 2016 for an initial # 8.8 m fee and played 33 premier league games last term . the netherlands international , 26 , scored five goals in 36 league and cup games during his spell at boro . meanwhile , manager garry monk confirmed the championship club 's interest in signing chelsea midfielder lewis baker . `` he 's a target and one of many that we 've had throughout the summer months , '' said monk . find all the latest football transfers on our dedicated page .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 马丁·德容恩(Marten de Roon)于2016年6月加盟提赛德(Teesside)，上赛季在英超联赛中出场33次，打进5球。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 德罗恩于2016年6月以880万英镑的转会费加盟提西德，并在上赛季出场33次英超比赛。这位26岁的荷兰国脚在提西德期间共打进5球，共出场36次联赛和杯赛。同时，主教练加里·蒙克确认了球队对切尔西中场刘易斯·贝克的兴趣。蒙克说：“他是我们在夏季几个月里的目标之一。”请在我们专门的页面上找到最新的足球转会消息。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 马滕·德鲁恩以880万英镑的费用转会到提赛德，加里·蒙克确认有意签下刘易斯·贝克。德鲁恩在提赛德效力一年，共打33场英超比赛，贝克可能会加盟提赛德。

xsum.src: 29 june 2015 last updated at 11:41 bst mr richards , 19 , from wednesbury , was among 38 killed when a tunisian student linked to islamic state extremists opened fire on a beach in sousse on friday . he was a walsall fc fan , football referee and student at the university of worcester . chief executive of the birmingham county football association , chad ehlertsen , said `` it just makes you smile every time you think about joel . '' `` he was just a leader of young people ; a good organiser , a good communicator and an extremely talented young referee , '' mr ehlertsen said .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 周五，伊斯兰国(Islamic State)极端分子在苏塞海滩(Sousse Beach)发生枪击案，造成38人死亡，其中包括19岁的伍斯特(Worcester)大学学生乔尔·理查兹(Joel Richards)。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 2015年6月29日，上午11:41，最后更新。来自韦斯伯里的19岁的理查兹先生是在星期五，一名与伊斯兰国极端分子有关的突尼斯学生在苏斯海滩开枪时，38人遇难的其中一人。他是沃索尔足球俱乐部的球迷，足球裁判，也是伍斯特大学的学生。伯明翰郡足球协会的首席执行官查德·埃勒特森说：“每次想到乔尔，都会让你微笑。”“他只是年轻人的领袖；一个优秀的组织者，一个优秀的沟通者，也是一位极具天赋的年轻裁判，”埃勒特森先生说道。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 19岁的乔尔·理查兹是一名沃尔索尔足球俱乐部的球迷和伍斯特大学的学生。他在突尼斯索斯海滩被枪杀，死于伊斯兰国极端分子的袭击。他是一位优秀的足球裁判和年轻人的领导者，被伯明翰县足球协会的首席执行官查德·埃勒特森称赞。

xsum.src: media playback is unsupported on your device 24 june 2015 last updated at 13:21 bst 59-year-old vivian gabb , a pilates and tennis coach from london , was in the final stages of buying a house when the scammers struck . she was unaware that her email had been hacked and every email she wrote and received was being monitored by criminals . they sent her a message disguised as a follow-up email from her solicitor , asking for nearly # 50,000 to be paid into their account . the internet safety advice website get safe online says more than half -lrb- 51 % -rrb- of people in the uk have been a victim of an online crime , and 15 % of people have been victims of either attempted or successful hacks of their email account . watch victoria derbyshire on weekdays from 09:15 -11:00 bst on bbc two and bbc news channel . follow the programme on facebook and twitter , and find all our content online .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 59 岁的维维安·盖布(Vivian Gabe)被黑客侵入电子邮件发送欺诈信息，骗取了5万英镑。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 2015年6月24日，59岁的伦敦普拉提和网球教练维维安·加布正在购买一栋房子的最后阶段，但遭遇了骗子的袭击。她不知道自己的电子邮件被黑客入侵，所有发出和收到的邮件都被犯罪分子监控。他们发送了一条伪装成她律师的跟进邮件，要求将近5万英镑汇入他们的账户。网络安全咨询网站Get Safe Online表示，超过一半（51%）的英国人曾遭受过网络犯罪，15%的人曾遭受过电子邮件账户被入侵的尝试或成功。请在周一至周五上午09:15-11:00在BBC Two和BBC新闻频道收看维多利亚·德比郡节目。关注我们的Facebook和Twitter页面，也可以在网上找到我们的所有内容。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 英国伦敦的Vivian Gabb，一位健身教练，因电子邮件被黑客攻击，导致在购买房屋时损失近50,000英镑。网络安全建议网站显示，51%的英国人曾成为网络犯罪受害者，15%的人遭遇过电子邮件黑客攻击。Victoria Derbyshire节目报道此事件。

xsum.src: clapham said his position had become `` untenable '' following criticism in the media and on social media . the decision followed on from the news that three directors , including shrouder , would step aside in june . director nigel allen will take on the chairmanship on an interim basis while new investors are sought . clapham added : '' -lrb- directors -rrb- nigel allen and liam watson are considering their positions , nigel has agreed to act as interim chairman until the 30 june 2017 during which time the board will seek a meeting with the trust in yellow board to establish their views for the future as the call for change has come from them following the open meeting . `` the board will urgently seek to establish any level of interest in bringing in investors who may wish to take a controlling interest in the ownership of the club . '' after their relegation from the national league was confirmed following defeat by dover athletic , southport beat promotion-chasing forest green rovers - only their third win of 2017 .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 由于媒体和社交媒体的批评，克拉普汉姆(Clapham)辞去了职务，包括谢尔盖(Shrouder)在内的三位董事于2017年6月离职，奈杰尔·艾伦(Nigel Allen)担任临时主席。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 克拉普汉姆表示，他的职位已经变得“不可持续”，因为媒体和社交媒体上的批评。这一决定是在三名董事，包括肖德尔，将在6月份辞职的消息之后做出的。董事尼格尔·艾伦将暂时担任主席，同时寻求新的投资者。克拉普汉姆补充说：“尼格尔·艾伦和利亚姆·沃森正在考虑他们的职位，尼格尔已经同意在2017年6月30日之前担任临时主席，期间董事会将寻求与黄色信托董事会会面，了解他们对未来的看法，因为要求改变是来自他们在公开会议上的呼吁。”董事会将紧急寻求确定是否有兴趣引入投资者，他们可能希望控制俱乐部的所有权。在被多佛竞技队击败后，南港被降级到国家联赛，但他们在2017年仅取得第三场胜利的情况下击败了晋级争夺者森林绿色流浪者。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 南港足球俱乐部主席Ian Kyle辞职，三名董事退出，Nigel Allen成为临时主席，寻求新投资者。南港降级后击败Forest Green Rovers，董事会将与信托董事会商讨未来计划。

xsum.src: the advocacy group glaad analysed shows seen or to be shown between june 2016 and may 2017 and counted 278 regular and recurring lgbt characters . the number of transgender characters has risen from seven to 16 this year . but glaad bemoaned the fact that more than 25 lesbian and bisexual female characters died or were killed off . they include the characters poussey washington and bea smith , who met violent ends in orange is the new black and wentworth respectively . the report also found a record high percentage of black characters on broadcast television , thanks mostly to shows like empire , luke cage and how to get away with murder . glaad 's where we are on tv study based its findings on scripted broadcast , cable and streaming series already being shown or for which casting had been confirmed . glaad 's president sarah kate ellis said it was `` heartening to see progress being made '' but said numbers were `` only part of the story '' . follow us on twitter @bbcnewsents , on instagram at bbcnewsents , or if you have a story suggestion email entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk .
xsum.element-aware_summary: GLAAD的研究发现，2016年6月至2017年5月期间，节目中的LGBT和跨性别角色有所增加，这引发了人们对杀害女同性恋和双性恋女性的反复趋势的担忧。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 在2016年6月至2017年5月期间，倡导团体GLAAD分析了已经播出或即将播出的节目，发现共有278个常规和重复出现的LGBT角色。今年，跨性别角色的数量从7个增加到了16个。但GLAAD对于超过25个女同性恋和双性恋女性角色的死亡或被杀的事实感到遗憾。其中包括在《女子监狱》和《温特沃斯》中遭遇暴力结局的Poussey Washington和Bea Smith。报告还发现，广播电视上黑人角色的比例创下历史新高，主要得益于《帝国》、《卢克·凯奇》和《逍遥法外》等节目。GLAAD的《电视剧中的我们》研究基于已经播出或已确认演员阵容的编剧广播、有线和流媒体系列节目。GLAAD总裁萨拉·凯特·埃利斯表示，看到取得进展是“令人振奋的”，但数字只是“故事的一部分”。关注我们的Twitter账号@bbcnewsents，Instagram账号bbcnewsents，或者如果您有故事建议，请发送电子邮件至entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 2016年6月至2017年5月，glaad分析了278个常规和重复出现的lgbt角色，其中跨性别角色从7个增加到16个。25多个女同性恋和双性恋女性角色死亡，但黑人角色比例创纪录高。虽然取得进步，但对女同性恋和双性恋女性角色的死亡表示担忧。

xsum.src: two women lost a leg and three other people were seriously hurt when their carriage hit a stationary carriage on the smiler ride on 2 june . the ride , which has been closed since the accident , is to reopen on 19 march when the staffordshire theme park reopens for its new season . the owner of the attraction is to be prosecuted over the crash . merlin attractions operation ltd will appear at north staffordshire justice centre on 22 april , the health and safety executive announced last week . four people sitting in the front row of the carriage were among those most seriously hurt in the crash . for updates on this and other staffordshire stories vicky balch , 20 , from lancashire , had six rounds of surgery in a bid to save her leg before needing an amputation . leah washington , 17 , from barnsley , also had one of her legs amputated , while her 18-year-old boyfriend , joe pugh , shattered his knees . daniel thorpe , 27 , from buxton , derbyshire , was treated for a collapsed lung and leg injuries . the fifth person , chanda chauhan , 49 , from wednesbury , underwent surgery after suffering internal injuries .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 斯塔福德郡(Staffordshire)主题公园将于3月19日重新开发，由于设施故障导致5人受伤，该游乐设施自去年6月2日起关闭，该公园将于4月22日被起诉。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 6月2日，两名女性失去了一条腿，另外三人也受了重伤，当他们的车厢撞上了“微笑者”游乐设施上的一辆静止车厢。这个游乐设施自事故发生后就一直关闭，但将在3月19日重新开放，与斯塔福德郡主题公园的新季节一起开放。该景点的所有者将因此事故受到起诉。上周，英国卫生与安全执行委员会宣布，梅林游乐设施运营有限公司将于4月22日在北斯塔福德郡法院出庭。事故中最严重受伤的四名乘客坐在车厢的前排。20岁的维基·巴尔奇来自兰开夏郡，在失去一条腿前接受了六次手术。17岁的莉亚·华盛顿来自巴恩斯利，也失去了一条腿，而她18岁的男朋友乔·普格则双膝粉碎。27岁的丹尼尔·索普来自德比郡巴克斯顿，因肺部塌陷和腿部受伤接受了治疗。第五个受伤的人，49岁的钱达·乔汉，在遭受内部伤害后接受了手术。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 6月2日，笑脸游乐设施事故导致两名女性失去一条腿，三名其他人受重伤。斯塔福德郡主题公园将于3月19日重新开放，但所有者将于4月22日在北斯塔福德郡法院受审。受害者接受手术和截肢，一名受伤者接受治疗。

xsum.src: activists want to stop the consumption of dog meat at the festival in the southern city of yulin which is due to begin later this month . correspondents say animal rights is a growing concern in china . there have been frequent calls to treat animals more humanely . about 24 activists accompanied by their dogs handed in the petition at the representative office of yulin city in the chinese capital , beijing . they unfurled banners with pictures of their pets alongside the message : `` i 'm not your dinner . '' the annual festival - due to begin on 21 june - involves the slaughter of thousands of dogs for human consumption . figures cited by the washington post say about 30 million dogs are killed across asia every year for their meat , with more than a third of that number killed in china . opponents say many dogs are either stolen or are strays rounded up for the festival . they say many are caged in cramped conditions before being killed . campaigning group humane society international has described the yulin event as a `` nightmare not a festival '' . supporters of the festival argue that dog meat is good for people and eating canines is no different from consuming any other meat . in 2014 , the yulin government distanced itself from the festival , arguing it was organised by private business people and did not have official backing . celebrities including british comedian ricky gervais have criticised the festival along with chinese pop star chen kun and actors yang mi and fan bingbing . the tradition of eating dog meat dates back four or five hundred years in china , south korea and other countries , as it is believed to ward off the heat of the summer months , according to state news agency xinhua . however , the yulin festival only began in recent years , xinhua reported last year .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 中国的动物权利活动人士提交了一份请愿书，呼吁结束每年数千只狗被屠宰供人食用的节日，而支持者则认为狗肉与其他类型的肉没有什么不同。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 一群动物权利活动人士要求在本月底即将开始的中国南方城市玉林的节日停止食用狗肉。据记者报道，动物权利是中国日益关注的问题。人们频繁呼吁更人道地对待动物。大约24名携带宠物狗的活动人士在中国首都北京的玉林市代表处递交了请愿书。他们展开了横幅，上面印有他们宠物的照片，以及“我不是你的晚餐”的信息。这个每年6月21日开始的节日涉及屠杀数千只狗用于人类食用。《华盛顿邮报》引用的数据显示，每年有大约3000万只狗在亚洲被杀害，其中超过三分之一在中国。反对者称，许多狗要么被偷走，要么是被捕捉的流浪狗用于节日。他们说，许多狗在被杀前被关在拥挤的条件下。动物保护组织国际人道协会将玉林节描述为“噩梦而不是节日”。节日的支持者认为，狗肉对人体有益，食用狗肉与食用其他任何肉类没有区别。2014年，玉林政府与节日保持距离，称其由私营商人组织，没有官方支持。英国喜剧演员瑞奇·杰维斯以及中国流行歌手陈坤、演员杨幂和范冰冰等名人都批评了这个节日。据新华社报道，食用狗肉的传统可以追溯到四五百年前的中国、韩国和其他国家，因为人们认为这可以驱散夏季的炎热。然而，新华社去年报道称，玉林节日是近年才开始的。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 动物权利活动家递交请愿书，要求停止在玉林节上食用狗肉。每年的玉林节涉及屠杀数千只狗用于人类食用，引发争议。中国对动物权利的关注日益增加，但一些人仍将食用狗肉视为文化传统。

xsum.src: the 65-year-old was found dead in the garden of his gated home in south weald in june 2015 . although essex police originally thought he died of natural causes , it emerged he had been shot six times . police said they had questioned a man originally from tyneside but currently living in southern spain . the force says the man was not arrested but volunteered to be interviewed at a police station in the uk . the force did not specify which police station he was interviewed at . the interview took place on saturday morning . an inquest into palmer 's death concluded he was unlawfully killed . police have said his shooting had `` all the hallmarks of a professional hit '' . palmer , once described as britain 's richest criminal and thought to have been worth # 300m , got his nickname after he was arrested on suspicion of melting down gold from the brink 's - mat robbery , although he was never convicted . the robbery in 1983 took place at heathrow airport when # 25m worth of gold was stolen . at the time it was the biggest robbery to have ever taken place in the uk . the former scrap metal dealer , from olton , near birmingham , who was one of seven children , was said to have melted the metal down in the back garden of his mansion at lansdown near bath . however , he denied knowing it was stolen and was acquitted in 1987 , blowing kisses to the jury from the dock when the verdict was delivered . worth about # 500m in today 's prices , most of the gold has never been recovered and the case remains open . in 1997 palmer was arrested in tenerife , and returned to the uk to face charges related to a large-scale timeshare fraud . in may 2001 he was sentenced to eight years in prison and ordered to pay a record confiscation order of # 33m .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 2015年6月，一名65岁男子在家中花园中遭枪击六枪身亡，埃塞克斯警方(Essex Police)和一名居住在西班牙(Spain)泰恩赛德(Tyneside)的男子展开调查，而死者约翰·帕尔默有争议的过去，包括涉嫌参与Brink's Mat抢劫案和分时度假欺诈案。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 2015年6月，一名65岁的男子在他位于南威尔德的封闭住宅的花园里被发现死亡。虽然埃塞克斯警方最初认为他死于自然原因，但后来发现他被枪击六次。警方表示已经询问了一名来自泰恩赛德但目前居住在西班牙南部的男子。警方称这名男子没有被逮捕，但自愿在英国的一家警察局接受了访问。警方没有具体说明他接受访问的警察局是哪一家。访问发生在周六早上。对帕尔默死亡的调查认定他是被非法杀害的。警方表示他的枪击案具有“专业杀手”的特点。帕尔默曾被称为英国最富有的罪犯，据估计价值3亿英镑，他的绰号来自于他被指控熔化了布林克斯-马特抢劫案中的黄金，尽管他从未被定罪。1983年的抢劫案发生在希思罗机场，价值2500万英镑的黄金被盗。当时这是英国有史以来发生的最大抢劫案。这位前废铁商人来自伯明翰附近的奥尔顿，是七个孩子中的一个，据说他在巴斯附近的兰斯顿庄园的后花园里熔化了金属。然而，他否认知道这是被盗的，并在1987年被无罪释放，当陪审团宣判时从被告席向陪审团吹吻。按照今天的价格，价值约5亿英镑的大部分黄金仍未被追回，这个案件仍然悬而未决。1997年，帕尔默在特内里费被逮捕，并返回英国面对大规模分时度假欺诈的指控。2001年5月，他被判入狱8年，并被命令支付创纪录的3300万英镑的没收令。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 英国“金手指”帕尔默被发现死于花园，警方发现他被枪击六次。一名来自泰恩赛德的男子被询问，但未被逮捕。帕尔默曾被指控熔化从布林克斯-马特抢劫案中偷来的金子，但最终被无罪释放。他在1997年被捕并被判入狱八年，被命令支付创纪录的3300万英镑的没收令。

xsum.src: 28 august 2015 last updated at 14:08 bst the device was able to track and damage a free-flying drone during the trial in california . boeing is one of many companies working to develop high powered lasers that can be used in military or defence scenarios . the company says its new device is the most portable yet , and can be collapsed into four parts light enough to carry .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 波音公司(Boeing)开发了一种可折叠、轻便的设备，可以在无人机飞行时跟踪和禁用无人机。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 2015年8月28日，美国波音公司成功试验了一种能够追踪和破坏自由飞行无人机的设备。该公司是众多致力于开发高功率激光武器的公司之一。该公司表示，他们的新设备是目前最便携的，可以折叠成四部分，重量轻便，方便携带。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 波音公司在加利福尼亚州进行了一次试验，成功开发出一种便携式高功率激光器，可以追踪和损坏无人机。这将为军事/防御技术带来重大进步。

xsum.src: media playback is unsupported on your device 25 august 2015 last updated at 11:43 bst open bionics says its device can be made faster and more cheaply than current alternatives . it intends to launch a service next year that will 3d-scan amputees and then build and fit them with a custom-fitted socket and hand for about â # 2,000 . olly mcbride showed the bbc 's north america technology reporter dave lee how its current prototype works .
xsum.element-aware_summary: Open Bionics公司将在2016年推出一项服务，利用3D扫描技术为截肢者创建定制矫形支具和假手。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 开放仿生学表示，他们的设备可以比目前的替代品更快、更便宜地制造。他们计划明年推出一项服务，通过3D扫描截肢者，为他们定制适合的插座和手，费用约为2000英镑。奥利·麦克布赖德向BBC北美技术记者戴夫·李展示了他们目前的原型如何工作。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Open Bionics计划明年推出一项新服务，为截肢者提供定制的假肢，成本更低，速度更快。该服务将通过3D扫描和定制建造插座和手部。Olly McBride展示了原型，并接受了BBC北美技术记者Dave Lee的采访。

xsum.src: the body of malcolm ballantyne , known as malky , was found at his home in glebe place by a family member shortly after 13:00 on friday . a post-mortem examination is taking place but police are treating the death as suspicious . officers are trying to trace mr ballantyne 's movements on thursday and friday and are also checking cctv . det ch insp gary cunningham said : `` malky was found yesterday by a family member who is obviously distraught at what has happened . `` he is a well-known character in the area and has a routine where he visits and socialises in various pubs in stevenson most days - generally in the morning . `` we are keen to find out if anyone saw malky between 1000 hours on thursday 20 august and 1300 hours on friday 21 august . '' door-to-door inquiries are taking place in saltcoats and stevenson and there are extra uniformed patrols in the area .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 马尔科姆·巴兰坦(Malcolm ballantyne)的尸体于8月21日星期五下午在家中被发现，警方正在紧急调查死因。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 周五下午13:00左右，马尔基·巴兰坦恩（Malky）的尸体被家人发现在他位于格利布街的家中。警方正在进行验尸，但将死亡事件视为可疑。警方正在追查巴兰坦恩先生周四和周五的行踪，并检查闭路电视。侦探总监加里·坎宁安说：“昨天，马尔基被家人发现，家人对发生的事情感到非常悲痛。”他是该地区的知名人物，每天早上都会去史蒂文森的各个酒吧社交。“我们急于找出在8月20日星期四上午10点至8月21日星期五下午1点之间是否有人看到马尔基。”警方正在盐湖城和史蒂文森进行门对门调查，并在该地区增加了巡逻警力。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 马尔科姆·巴兰坦恩的尸体被发现在家中，警方正在调查他的死亡。警方正在追踪他的活动，进行尸检和调查，以确定死因。居民被要求提供信息，警方正在加强巡逻。

xsum.src: south wales police said david ellis , 40 , his lodger , has been arrested in ireland . officers are liaising with garda officers in connection with his extradition back to the uk . retired telecoms engineer mr warburton , 59 , has not been seen since 31 july . police launched an appeal for information after he went missing ; they said his m-reg peugeot 205 had been spotted in north wales before returning to swansea . the car was found abandoned at birkenhead port some days later . police said mr ellis , who had been mr warburton 's lodger in sketty , had stepped off a ferry in belfast , northern ireland , on 6 august . that discovery prompted a fresh appeal for information and led to welsh officers being sent across the irish sea . south wales police said mr warburton 's family had been informed of the latest development in the investigation and continued to be assisted by family liaison officers . mr warburton 's body has not been found ; detectives have previously said they are treating the incident as murder .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 7月31日失踪的沃伯顿先生(Warburton)的房客大卫·埃利斯(David Ellis)已在爱尔兰被捕，正在等待引渡。与此同时，在南威尔士警方(South Wales Police)和爱尔兰警方(Garda)的合作下，对沃伯顿((Warburton))失踪案的调查仍在继续。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 南威尔士警方表示，40岁的大卫·埃利斯和他的房客已在爱尔兰被逮捕。警方正在与爱尔兰警方合作，将他引渡回英国。退休电信工程师59岁的沃伯顿先生自7月31日以来就没有露面。警方在他失踪后发起了信息征集，称他的M牌号标致205车曾在北威尔士被发现，然后返回斯旺西。几天后，这辆车被发现在伯肯黑德港被遗弃。警方表示，埃利斯先生曾是沃伯顿先生在斯凯蒂的房客，他于8月6日从贝尔法斯特的渡轮上下来。这一发现促使警方发起了新的信息征集，并导致威尔士警察被派往爱尔兰海峡。南威尔士警方表示，沃伯顿先生的家人已被告知调查的最新进展，并继续得到家庭联络官的协助。沃伯顿先生的尸体尚未被发现；侦探们此前曾表示，他们正在将此事件视为谋杀案。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 南威尔士警方逮捕了大卫·埃利斯，40岁，他是失踪的沃伯顿先生的房客。警方发现埃利斯先生在爱尔兰，涉嫌谋杀案。沃伯顿先生的家人已被告知最新进展。警方仍在寻找沃伯顿先生的尸体。

xsum.src: tuilagi , 23 , is still recovering from the injury he suffered in october . cockerill is confident tuilagi will return in time to play at the world cup for the national side , who came close to winning the six nations without him . `` he 's improving all the time but the likelihood now is he may not play this season , '' he told bbc radio 5 live . `` the likelihood is he will be fit for june and he 'll join england for their world cup camp . `` hopefully he 'll be involved in the world cup warm-ups and have a huge say in how england do . '' stuart lancaster 's tournament hosts get their world cup campaign under way against fiji at twickenham on 18 september . before that , they face warm-up fixtures against france in august , both home and away , before a final run-out against ireland at twickenham on 5 september . samoa-born tuilagi has won 25 caps and scored 11 tries for england , while also featuring once for the british and irish lions . his last international outing came during england 's 3-0 series defeat to new zealand in june . as part of his treatment , tuilagi has had prolotherapy - involving injections of a sugar solution .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 马努·图伊拉吉(Manu Tuilagi)目前正在养伤，预计他将能够参加6月的英格兰世界杯比赛，在没有他的情况下，英格兰队即将赢得六国杯(Six Nations)冠军。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 23岁的图拉吉仍在恢复10月份受伤的伤势。科克里尔相信图拉吉将在世界杯期间为国家队出战，尽管没有他，英格兰队在六国赛中也差点获胜。他告诉BBC Radio 5 Live说：“他的状况一直在改善，但现在的可能性是他本赛季可能无法出场。”“他很可能会在6月份恢复健康，加入英格兰队参加世界杯训练营。”“希望他能参加世界杯热身赛，并对英格兰的表现有重大影响。”斯图尔特·兰开斯特的球队将在9月18日在特威克纳姆迎战斐济开始世界杯征程。在此之前，他们将在8月份与法国进行两场热身赛，然后在9月5日在特威克纳姆对阵爱尔兰。萨摩亚出生的图拉吉为英格兰队出场25次，打进11球，还曾一次代表英国和爱尔兰狮子队出战。他最后一次国际比赛是在6月份英格兰对阵新西兰的3-0系列赛中。作为治疗的一部分，图拉吉接受了葡萄糖溶液注射的治疗。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 英格兰国家橄榄球队中锋Manu Tuilagi因受伤可能无法参加本赛季比赛，但预计会在6月回归，并参加世界杯热身赛。他的回归将对英格兰在世界杯上发挥重要作用。

xsum.src: police have been searching the site in milton , cambridgeshire , for five weeks . despite a high-profile missing persons campaign , it is thought by police he ended up in a bin lorry . mr mckeague 's father martin said it was `` breathtaking '' to see how much waste officers have combed through . live : updates on this story and other suffolk news he has been to the site five times and is staying in a nearby campsite with his wife trish . `` it 's heartbreaking to think when you are there corrie could be under foot , '' he said . `` everything leads to corrie being there and when i 'm looking at and watching these guys rake through , i know the police would n't be here going through all these tonnes of rubbish if they did n't expect corrie to be there . '' mr mckeague , from dunfermline in fife , vanished while on a night out in bury st edmunds , suffolk , on 24 september . he was last seen on cctv at about 03:25 bst . a bin lorry collected refuse a short time later from the area the raf honington gunner was last seen . suffolk police said officers were trawling through 60 tonnes a day at the site in milton , near cambridge . the search is now in its fifth week and is expected to take up to 10 .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 9月24日的一个晚上，麦基格先生(McKeague)在萨福克郡(Suffolk)伯里圣埃德蒙兹(Bury St. Edmunds)失踪，警方相信他最终被一辆垃圾车带走，该车已经搜查了五个星期，但仍没有结论。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 警方已经在剑桥郡米尔顿的现场搜寻了五周。尽管有一场高调的失踪人员搜寻活动，但警方认为他最终被垃圾车带走了。麦克奎格的父亲马丁表示，看到警察搜查了如此多的垃圾，令人惊叹。他已经来到现场五次，和妻子特里什住在附近的营地。他说：“想到当你在那里的时候，科里可能就在脚下，这让人心碎。”“一切都指向科里就在那里，当我看着这些人梳理时，我知道如果警察不认为科里在那里，他们就不会来这里搜查这些吨的垃圾。”麦克奎格来自苏格兰费夫的邓弗姆林，于9月24日在萨福克伯里圣埃德蒙兹的一次夜晚外出后失踪。他最后一次在03:25左右被CCTV拍到。垃圾车在不久后从他最后被看到的地区收集垃圾。萨福克警方表示，警察每天在米尔顿附近的现场搜查60吨垃圾。搜查现在已经进入第五周，预计需要花费最多10周的时间。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 苏福克警方在米尔顿地点搜索科里·麦克伊格，已经进行了五周，预计需要10周时间。麦克伊格的父亲多次访问该地点，警方每天梳理60吨垃圾。麦克伊格在伯里圣埃德蒙兹失踪，警方认为他最终被送到垃圾车中。

xsum.src: the crucible 's production of show boat and its new musical flowers for mrs harris are both up for best musical . paapa essiedu , the royal shakespeare company 's first black hamlet , is in the running for best performance in a play . sir ian mckellen will receive a special prize at this year 's event , to be held at london 's guildhall on 9 october . previous recipients of the outstanding contribution to british theatre award include sir peter hall , choreographer sir matthew bourne and actor simon callow . clare burt is nominated for best performance in a musical for flowers for mrs harris , which was adapted from a 1958 novel by paul gallico . daniel evans directed both flowers for mrs harris and show boat , which transferred to the west end in april . he has since left sheffield theatres to become artistic director of chichester festival theatre . chichester 's exuberant summer production of half a sixpence is up for two awards ahead of its west end transfer next month . actress lesley manville , host of this year 's awards ceremony , said she `` looked forward to celebrating a year of artistic achievement '' . the full list of nominations is as follows : theatregoers have until 12:00 bst on 19 september to cast their vote for the uk 's most welcoming theatre . follow us on twitter @bbcnewsents , on instagram , or if you have a story suggestion email entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 克鲁斯堡剧院的《Show Boat》和《Flowers for Mrs Harris》将角逐最佳音乐剧奖，帕帕·埃塞杜(Paapa Essiedu)将获得最佳话剧表演提名，而伊恩·麦克莱恩(Ian McKellen)将在10月9日的颁奖典礼上获奖。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 今年的英国戏剧奖提名名单已经公布，其中包括《炼狱》和新音乐剧《为哈里斯夫人献花》的最佳音乐剧提名。皇家莎士比亚剧团首位黑人哈姆雷特演员帕帕·埃西杜也入围最佳戏剧表演奖。伊恩·麦克莱恩爵士将在今年的颁奖典礼上获得特别奖项。今年的最佳英国戏剧贡献奖得主包括彼得·霍尔爵士、舞蹈家马修·伯恩爵士和演员西蒙·卡洛。《为哈里斯夫人献花》改编自保罗·加利科1958年的小说，克莱尔·伯特因此入围最佳音乐剧表演奖。丹尼尔·埃文斯导演了《为哈里斯夫人献花》和《炼狱》，后者于四月份转移到西区。他已经离开谢菲尔德剧院，担任奇切斯特节日剧院的艺术总监。奇切斯特夏季的热闹制作《半便士》也入围两项奖项，在下个月转移到西区。今年颁奖典礼的主持人莱斯利·曼维尔女士表示，她“期待庆祝一年的艺术成就”。截止到9月19日中午12点，观众可以投票选出英国最受欢迎的剧院。关注我们的推特@bbcnewsents，或者通过电子邮件entertainment.news@bbc.co.uk提供故事建议。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 英国戏剧奖提名公布，Show Boat和Half a Sixpence转移到西区，Daniel Evans离开Sheffield Theatres。Paapa Essiedu和Clare Burt入围最佳表演奖，Sir Ian McKellen将获杰出贡献奖。Lesley Manville主持颁奖典礼，庆祝英国戏剧艺术成就。截止9月19日，观众可投票选出最受欢迎剧院。

xsum.src: anthony kevin morais went missing on 4 september after leaving his house . police said they had arrested seven suspects in the case , one of whom led them to the body early on wednesday . one of the suspects was involved in a corruption case prosecuted by mr morais recently , local media quoted police as saying . the 52-year-old armed forces medical officer is believed to have contracted the other suspects , the star quoted police as saying . police were led to a river at 06:00 local time on wednesday , comm datuk seri mohmad salleh , director of the criminal investigation department , told reporters . divers confirmed the oil drum was in the river and a forklift was used to hoist it out of the water , he said . the body was found after the oil drum was broken open . cctv footage showed mr morais 's car being trailed by another vehicle which rammed into him . he was abducted after the collision , police said . the body has been sent to a kuala lumpur hospital for post mortem examination .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 安东尼·凯文·莫赖斯(Anthony Kevin Morais)于9月4日离家后失踪，周三被发现死于河中的一个油桶中，尸检正在进行中。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 安东尼·凯文·莫雷斯于9月4日离开家后失踪。警方表示，他们已经逮捕了七名嫌疑人，其中一人在周三早上带领他们找到了尸体。据当地媒体报道，其中一名嫌疑人曾参与莫雷斯先生最近的一起腐败案件。这位52岁的武装部队医务官被认为是其他嫌疑人的雇主，星报援引警方的话说。警方在周三上午6点被带到一条河流，刑事调查部门主任达图克·塞里·莫哈默德·萨莱告诉记者。潜水员确认油桶在河里，叉车被用来将其从水中吊起，他说。尸体是在油桶被打开后发现的。闭路电视录像显示，莫雷斯先生的车被另一辆车跟踪，后者撞上了他。警方称，他在碰撞后被绑架。尸体已被送往吉隆坡医院进行尸检。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 安东尼·凯文·莫雷斯失踪后，警方逮捕了七名嫌疑人，其中一人带领警方找到了他的尸体。尸体在一条河流中被发现，警方怀疑他们是因为最近莫雷斯参与的一起腐败案件而被绑架。尸体已被送往医院进行尸检。

xsum.src: a 20-year-old man was with a male friend in old rutherglen road when another man attacked him with a weapon at about 13:05 on 22 september . the victim was treated in hospital for a leg injury . detectives believe the man in the images may be able to help with their inquiry . he is described as white , aged about 20 , with short brown hair . at the time of the incident , he was wearing a tracksuit top that was white at the front and light blue at the back , dark tracksuit trousers and dark trainers . he was last seen walking on caledonia road towards cathcart road . det con nicol mcpherson said : `` this was a violent attack that took place in broad daylight which left this man with a serious leg injury . `` i would urge anyone who recognises the man in the images , or who has information that may assist the investigation to contact cathcart police office . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 9月22日13时05分左右，两名男子在老鲁瑟格伦路(Old Rutherglen Road)遭到袭击，导致腿部受伤，警方正在调查袭击者的信息。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 一名20岁的男子与一名男性朋友在老鲁瑟格伦路上，被另一名男子在9月22日13:05左右用武器袭击，导致腿部受伤，随后被送往医院治疗。警方相信这些照片中的男子可能能够帮助他们的调查。他被描述为20岁左右的白人，短发，当时穿着一件前面是白色，后面是浅蓝色的运动上衣，黑色运动裤和黑色运动鞋。他最后被看到在卡莱多尼亚路朝卡特卡特路走去。调查员尼古拉·麦克弗森说：“这是一起在白天发生的暴力袭击，导致这名男子严重受伤。”我呼吁任何认识这些照片中男子的人，或者有任何可能帮助调查的信息的人，与卡特卡特警察局联系。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 一名20岁男子在老鲁瑟格伦路与另一名男子发生冲突，导致受伤。受害者被送往医院治疗，警方正在寻找一名20岁男子协助调查。事件发生于9月22日，受害者腿部受伤。

xsum.src: thomas bebbington , 22 , from shrewsbury , was last seen entering the river near the dana steps at about 19:20 gmt on 10 november . a body was found by a member of the public on private land near leighton , about 10 miles -lrb- 16.09 km -rrb- away from the centre of shrewsbury , on monday . mr bebbington 's family has been informed , west mercia police confirmed .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 周一，在伦顿(Renton)附近的私人土地上发现了一具尸体，后来证实是22岁的托马斯·贝宾顿(Thomas Bebbington)的尸体，他于11月10日失踪。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 22岁的托马斯·贝宾顿来自英国谢鲁斯伯里，于11月10日19:20左右进入达纳台阶附近的河流后失踪。周一，一名公众在距离谢鲁斯伯里中心约10英里（16.09公里）的莱顿私人土地上发现了一具尸体。西默西亚警方已经通知了贝宾顿先生的家人。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 舒兹伯里22岁的托马斯·贝宾顿于11月10日19:20进入河流，尸体于星期一在莱顿被发现。西默西亚警察确认并通知家人。

xsum.src: the plane crashed in holme fen during a 300mph -lrb- 483km/h -rrb- training mission in november 1940 , killing 20-year-old pilot officer harold penketh . experts from oxford archaeology east and cranfield university have spent five days recovering the plane . its parts will be preserved and put on public display . here is the story of the excavation , told in photographs :
xsum.element-aware_summary: 在1940年11月，这架飞机在一次训练中坠毁，造成哈罗德·彭斯克（Harold Penske）丧生。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 这篇文章讲述了1940年11月，一架飞机在霍姆芬坠毁，飞行员哈罗德·彭克斯在一次300英里每小时的训练任务中丧生。牛津东考古学和克兰菲尔德大学的专家花了五天时间挖掘这架飞机，将其部件保存并公开展示。以下是挖掘过程的照片故事。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 1940年11月，飞行员哈罗德·彭克斯在Holme Fen进行300mph（483km/h）的训练任务时坠毁，牛津考古学东部和克兰菲尔德大学专家花了5天挖掘和回收飞机部件。这些部件将被保存并公开展示。

xsum.src: the 32-year-old irishman is accused of striking dundee united striker aidan connolly in the face with his elbow . goodwin was not pulled up for the offence during united 's 3-0 win . should he accept the ban , the midfielder would miss three games from 15 november because of an additional suspension due to his recent record . goodwin has until wednesday to respond to the complaint , with a hearing set for thursday . he was banned for two matches last season for elbowing united midfielder stuart armstrong . this came after united released their own footage of the incident in the match at st mirren park .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 古德温(Goodwin)被指控犯有暴力行为，从11月15日起被禁赛三场。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 这篇文章讲述了32岁的爱尔兰人史蒂芬·古德温被指控用手肘击打邓迪联队前锋艾丹·康诺利的脸部。尽管在邓迪联队3-0战胜史密森的比赛中没有因此被罚，但如果古德温接受禁赛，他将因为最近的记录而缺席11月15日的三场比赛。古德温必须在周三前回应这项指控，周四将进行听证会。上赛季，他因为肘击邓迪联队中场斯图尔特·阿姆斯特朗而被禁赛两场。这起事件发生后，邓迪联队发布了自己的录像。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 爱尔兰球员Goodwin被指控用肘击打Dundee United的Connolly，但在比赛中未被罚下。他可能面临禁赛和停赛，星期四举行听证会。上赛季因为类似违规行为被禁赛。

xsum.src: network rail is doing work in the chipping sodbury and alderton tunnels and building a new platform at bristol parkway . the improvements will run from saturday until 15 september . they will allow new trains to run on the great western rail mainline , including new intercity express trains . for the duration of the works , those travelling between south wales and london should note : for those travelling to and from south wales during the august bank holiday weekend from 26 august to 28 august : during the weekends from 23-24 september until 18-19 november , there will be further improvement work affecting south wales and bristol parkway services . passengers are advised to check their journeys .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 英国铁路网络公司(Network Rail)的改善活动将从周六持续到9月15日，这将影响南威尔士(South Wales)、布里斯托尔大道(Bristol Parkway)和伦敦(London)之间的旅行活动。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 网络铁路正在进行在奇平索德伯里和奥尔德顿隧道的工程，并在布里斯托尔公园建造一个新的站台。这些改进工程将从9月15日持续到周六。它们将允许新的列车在大西部铁路干线上运行，包括新的城际快车列车。在工程期间，那些前往南威尔士和伦敦的旅客应该注意：在8月26日至28日的银行假日周末，前往和从南威尔士的旅客应该注意：在9月23日至24日和11月18日至19日的周末，将会有进一步的改进工程影响南威尔士和布里斯托尔公园的服务。乘客们应该检查他们的旅程。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 网络铁路正在奇平·索德伯里和奥尔德顿隧道进行工作，建造布里斯托尔公园的新站台，允许新的城际快车在大西部铁路干线上运行。从8月26日至28日和9月23日至11月18日至19日的周末，南威尔士和布里斯托尔公园的服务将受到影响。乘客应注意检查行程。

xsum.src: hasan karkardi has been suspended for six months for sparring with blackwell , who was left requiring surgery to reduce swelling on his brain . the british boxing board of control said wilkins ' conduct was `` detrimental to the interests of boxing '' . blackwell , 26 , retired after suffering a bleed on the skull in march . he spent a week in an induced coma after losing his british middleweight title fight with chris eubank jr. . despite blackwell not having a licence to fight , and despite him being advised not to return to the ring , he sparred with karkardi , 29 , on 22 november at a boxing club in devizes , wiltshire . on wednesday , a family member told bbc sport blackwell is still unable to walk , and a year away from making a full recovery .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 拳击手哈桑·卡卡迪(Hassan Karkadi)因在11月22日与布莱克威尔(Blackwell)进行拳击比赛，导致后者脑部受伤，被英国拳击监管委员会(British Boxing Board of Control)停职六个月。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 英国拳击委员会因为哈桑·卡卡迪与布莱克威尔擂台赛后的争吵，将其禁赛六个月。布莱克威尔在与克里斯·尤班克的比赛中受伤，需要接受手术减轻脑部肿胀。尽管布莱克威尔没有拳击执照，也被建议不要重返赛场，但他仍然在11月22日与卡卡迪在威尔特郡的一个拳击俱乐部进行了拳击训练。周三，一位家庭成员告诉BBC体育，布莱克威尔仍然无法行走，需要一年的时间才能完全康复。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 英国拳击委员会因Nick Blackwell与Hasan Karkardi搏斗导致Nick Blackwell头部出血，建议其退役。然而，Nick Blackwell仍与Hasan Karkardi搏斗，导致Nick Blackwell需要手术减轻脑部肿胀。Hasan Karkardi因此被停赛六个月。Nick Blackwell仍无法行走，需要一年时间才能完全康复。

xsum.src: gary price was suspended from all council duties for five months in november after powys council 's standards committee ruled he had breached the code of conduct . his appeal has been dismissed by the adjudication panel for wales following a two-day hearing in llandrindod wells . mr price has been contacted for comment . he was found to have sent information which the council said `` incorrectly and unfairly '' portrayed what happened at a grievance appeal hearing , in which he was a panel member . the adjudication panel for wales unanimously agreed to refer the matter back to the standards committee with a recommendation that mr price be suspended for three months . council leader barry thomas said the decision `` sends out a clear message that those who enter public office have to operate within the members ' code of conduct and maintain the highest possible standards '' .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 加里·普莱斯(Gary Price)因违反行为准则，于11月被暂停所有议会职务。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 加里·普赖斯在11月被暂停所有议会职务，因为波伊斯郡议会的标准委员会裁定他违反了行为准则。他的上诉被威尔士仲裁小组驳回，经过两天的听证会后，他被发现发送了信息，据议会称这些信息“不正确且不公平地”描绘了一次申诉听证会，他是其中的一个小组成员。威尔士仲裁小组一致同意将此事提交给标准委员会，并建议暂停普赖斯三个月。议会领导人巴里·托马斯表示，这一决定“向公职人员发出明确的信息，即他们必须遵守成员行为准则，保持最高的标准”。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 议员加里·普赖斯因违反议员行为准则被波威斯议会停职五个月。他上诉被威尔士仲裁小组驳回，建议停职三个月。议会领袖巴里·托马斯表示，这一决定传达了在公职中保持高标准的信息。

xsum.src: saturday 's incident involved an mv-22 osprey belonging to the us marines based in okinawa , japan . the third marine expeditionary force said they had shifted their operations to recovery efforts , which could last several months . families of the three marines have been notified . the circumstances of the incident off the east coast of australia are still under investigation , a statement said . `` as the sea state permits , recovery efforts will be conducted to further search , assess and survey the area , in coordination and with assistance from the australian defence force , '' it added . the mv-22 osprey is a tilt-rotor aircraft similar to a conventional plane but has helicopter-like rotor blades which allow it to take off vertically , without a runway . there were 26 people on board including the crew . australia 's daily telegraph newspaper quoted military sources as saying the aircraft had been trying to land on the uss ronald reagan aircraft carrier . us military forces have been operating in the area as part of a joint training exercise called talisman sabre . it involved some 30,000 personnel from both countries .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 周六，一架mv-22“鱼鹰”战斗机在澳大利亚东海岸坠毁，导致三名海军陆战队士兵死亡，救援工作正在进行中，预计将持续数月。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 周六的事件涉及到一架属于驻扎在日本冲绳的美国海军陆战队的MV-22鱼鹰。第三海军远征军表示，他们已经将行动转移到了持续数月的搜救工作上。三名海军陆战队员的家属已经得到通知。事故发生在澳大利亚东海岸，目前仍在调查中。声明中称：“随着海况允许，将进行搜救工作，进一步搜索、评估和勘测该地区，并在澳大利亚国防部的协调和协助下进行。”MV-22鱼鹰是一种倾转旋翼飞机，类似于常规飞机，但具有直升机般的旋翼，可以垂直起飞，无需跑道。机上共有26人，包括机组人员。澳大利亚《每日电讯报》援引军方消息人士的话称，这架飞机当时正试图降落在罗纳德·里根号航空母舰上。美军部队正在该地区进行名为“护身符剑”的联合训练演习，参与人数达到3万人。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 美国海军陆战队在日本冲绳基地的MV-22鱼鹰发生事故，导致三名海军陆战队员失踪。恢复工作仍在进行中，调查仍在进行中。事故发生在澳大利亚东海岸，当时正在进行美澳联合训练演习。30,000名人员参与演习。

xsum.src: the 21-year-old was also suspended for four months backdated to 23 may although three of those months have been suspended until 1 july 2016 . townsend had already voluntarily withdrawn from the england squad for the european under-21 championship . it is believed he was not accused of betting on games he had involvement in . however , the fa has strict betting rules that forbid gambling on a wide spectrum of fixtures laid out in its regulations . the length of the up-front ban , coupled with the fact that he withdrew from the england under-21 squad , mean he will not miss a game . the midfielder , who was on loan at qpr for the second half of the season , is a product of tottenham 's academy and signed as a trainee in 2008 . he has had loan spells at yeovil , leyton orient , mk dons , ipswich , watford , millwall , leeds , birmingham and , most recently , with former spurs manager harry redknapp at qpr . townsend made his premier league debut for spurs in september 2012 before joining rangers in january , where he made 12 premier league appearances , scoring twice .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 21岁球员安德罗斯·汤森(Andros Townsend)因违反英格兰足球协会(English Football Association)投注规则而被禁赛四个月。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 21岁的汤森德也被禁赛了四个月，从5月23日起生效，但其中三个月被暂缓到2016年7月1日。汤森德已经自愿退出了英格兰队参加欧洲U21锦标赛。据悉，他并没有被指控在自己参与的比赛中下注。然而，英足总有严格的赌博规定，禁止在其规定的广泛比赛中进行赌博。前期禁赛的长度，加上他退出了英格兰U21队，意味着他不会错过任何比赛。这位中场球员是热刺青训营的产品，2008年以实习生身份加盟。他曾经被租借到耶奥维尔、莱顿东方、米尔顿凯恩斯、伊普斯维奇、沃特福德、米尔沃尔、利兹、伯明翰，最近与前热刺主帅哈里·雷德克纳普一起效力于QPR。汤森德在2012年9月为热刺首次登场英超联赛，之后在1月加盟QPR，在那里他出场12次，打进两球。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 安德罗斯·汤森德因违反英格兰足球协会的赌博规定被禁赛四个月，自愿退出英格兰U21国家队。他曾在多家俱乐部租借，2012年9月首次登场英超，2016年1月加盟QPR，出场12次并打进两球。禁赛期间不会错过比赛。

xsum.src: the 18-year-old man is still in hospital after the incident at leicester 's west gate school on 27 january . the school subsequently suspended three female members of staff . police confirmed the women were arrested in connection with allegations of neglect offences and then bailed pending further inquiries . chair of governors , the rev canon peter taylor , said : `` a number of investigations are being carried out into the circumstances of this tragic incident . `` three members of staff have been suspended while these take place . '' a leicestershire police spokeswoman said the pupil `` sustained injuries as a result of getting into difficulty in a swimming pool in glenfield road . '' she added that the women `` aged 49 , 61 and 62 , have been arrested in connection with the incident on neglect offences '' . leicester city council and the health and safety executive -lrb- hse -rrb- are also investigating . the school - which caters for students aged four to 19 with learning difficulties and disabilities - was officially opened by prince edward last year .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 一名18岁的男孩于1月27日在莱斯特(Leicester)的西门学校(Westgate School)游泳池受伤，三名工作人员被暂停职务。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 一名18岁男子在1月27日发生的莱斯特西门学校事件后仍在医院接受治疗。学校随后暂停了三名女员工的工作。警方证实这些女性因涉嫌疏忽罪名被逮捕，并被保释等待进一步调查。校董会主席彼得·泰勒牧师表示：“对这起悲剧事件的情况正在进行多项调查。”一名警方发言人表示，学生“在格伦菲尔德路的游泳池中遇到困难导致受伤”。她补充说，这些女性“年龄分别为49岁、61岁和62岁，因涉嫌疏忽罪名被逮捕”。莱斯特市议会和英国卫生与安全执行局也正在调查此事。这所学校为4至19岁的学习困难和残疾学生提供教育，去年由爱德华王子正式开幕。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 莱斯特西门学校一名18岁男生在游泳池受伤，三名女员工被停职并逮捕。学校、警方、市议会和HSE正在调查。学生仍在医院治疗。

xsum.src: the clip , filmed in norwich city centre , shows two men coming to blows in front of a stationary bus at the corner of prince of wales road and upper king street . both are seen grappling on the pavement before more punches are thrown . bus operator stagecoach said a driver had been suspended . no arrests have been made . in the video , the bus driver picks up what appears to be a badge from the middle of the street . for more norfolk stories , visit the bbc 's local live page for the county he returns to the bus , and the two men continue to trade insults . andy campbell , managing director of stagecoach east , confirmed a bus driver had been suspended . `` we understand on-street video footage of part of the incident has subsequently been posted on social media '' , he said . the company will launch its own investigation , and help police with their enquiries , he added . norfolk police said they were called to prince of wales road just before 16:00 bst on wednesday . they located one of the men when they arrived at the scene and were appealing for witnesses .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 社交媒体上发布了一段发生在诺里奇(Norwich)市中心的斗殴视频，涉事公交车司机已被停职，两名斗殴男子正在接受警方调查。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 这段视频拍摄于诺维奇市中心，显示两名男子在王子威尔士路和上王街的公交车站前发生冲突。两人在人行道上扭打，随后又互相投掷拳击。公交车运营商斯泰奇科奇表示，一名司机已被停职。目前还没有逮捕任何人。视频中，公交车司机从街道中间捡起一个徽章。欲了解更多诺福克的新闻，请访问BBC的当地直播页面。他回到公交车，两名男子继续互相辱骂。斯泰奇科奇东区总经理安迪·坎贝尔确认，一名公交车司机已被停职。他说：“我们了解到，事发后，一段街头视频被发布到社交媒体上。”公司将展开自己的调查，并协助警方调查。诺福克警方表示，他们在周三下午4点前接到报警，称王子威尔士路发生了冲突。他们到达现场后找到了其中一名男子，并呼吁目击者提供线索。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 两名男子在诺维奇市中心的一辆巴士前发生打斗，巴士司机被停职。视频显示，巴士司机从街上捡起徽章，警方已介入调查。巴士运营商Stagecoach表示将展开调查并协助警方。目前没有逮捕。

xsum.src: jamie cox was sentenced to 26 weeks for common assault after he attacked viktoria gribovskaja at her home in lambeth , south london last year . the swindon-based wbo european super-middleweight title holder had denied assault . his sentence was suspended at an appeal at croydon magistrates ' court . the 29-year-old boxer , who appeared in court under his real name jamie russan was told his conviction still stands , but that his prison sentence will be suspended for 18 months . recorder joseph boothby told him he should treat the suspended sentence as `` a turning point '' and said : `` change your ways and think before you get angry with a girlfriend , or anyone else for that matter . '' cox had been sentenced to 26 weeks in prison for the assault and harassment charges , 20 weeks for violence to secure entry and 12 weeks for criminal damage , to run concurrently . he is currently ranked number four in the world and is also a commonwealth games light welterweight champion . after the hearing , cox said : `` i just want to get back to normal and to fight for world titles . i do not really treat today as a success . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 拳击手杰米·考克斯(Jamie Cox)因闯入前女友维多利亚·格里博夫斯卡娅(Victoria Gribovskaya)家中殴打她而被判入狱，但缓刑18个月。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 詹米·考克斯去年在伦敦南部的兰贝斯家中袭击维克多里亚·格里博夫斯卡后，因普通袭击罪被判处26周监禁。这位来自斯温顿的WBO欧洲超级中量级冠军否认了袭击指控。在克罗伊登地方法院的上诉中，他的刑期被暂缓执行。29岁的拳击手，本名为杰米·拉桑，被告知他的定罪仍然有效，但他的监禁期将被暂缓18个月。法官约瑟夫·布思比告诉他，他应该把暂缓的刑期视为“一个转折点”，并说：“在对女朋友或其他人发脾气之前，要改变你的方式并三思而后行。”考克斯因袭击和骚扰罪被判处26周监禁，因暴力进入罪被判处20周监禁，因犯罪损害被判处12周监禁，同时执行。他目前在世界排名第四，也是英联邦运动会轻量级冠军。听完判决后，考克斯说：“我只想恢复正常，争夺世界冠军。我并不认为今天是一个成功。”
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 英国拳击手Jamie Cox因去年袭击女友Viktoria Gribovskaja被判26周监禁，但在上诉时被暂缓。法官告诫他改变行为，他表示希望回归拳击赛场。他目前在世界排名第四，也是Commonwealth Games冠军。

xsum.src: the accident happened on the edinburgh bypass between baberton and dreghorn at about 17:00 on monday . police said a woman on the bus was taken to hospital with a `` serious leg injury '' . her injury is not thought to be life-threatening . four other people who suffered minor injuries were also taken to hospital but were later released . the eastbound lane of the road was closed following the accident causing lengthy tailbacks . it was re-opened at 18:45 .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 周一下午5点左右，爱丁堡支路(Edinburgh Bypass)发生事故，造成5人受伤。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 周一下午17:00，在爱丁堡环城公路的巴伯顿和德雷格霍恩之间发生了一起事故。警方表示，一名乘坐公交车的女性因严重的腿部受伤被送往医院。她的伤势不会危及生命。另外四人也因轻微受伤被送往医院，但后来已经出院。事故导致东行车道关闭，造成长时间的交通拥堵。18:45时重新开放。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 爱丁堡环城公路发生公交车事故，造成一名女性严重腿部受伤，四人轻微受伤。东行车道关闭，交通拥堵，最终在18:45重新开放。

xsum.src: leah washington , 18 , and joe pugh , 19 , both from barnsley , were among four people badly injured on the smiler ride on 2 june when two carriages crashed . ms washington had a leg amputated and mr pugh suffered shattered knees . the event takes place at the metrodome arena in barnsley on 14 november and includes a pea and pies supper . midlands air ambulance , the royal stoke university hospital and staffordshire fire and rescue will benefit from the charity event . vicky balch , 20 , from lancashire , also had to have a leg amputated and daniel thorpe , 27 , from buxton , derbyshire , suffered serious leg injuries . twelve other people were trapped 25ft -lrb- 7.6 m -rrb- off the ground for several hours as emergency services attempted to rescue them .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 6月2日过山车事故的两名受害者将于11月14日举办慈善活动，为多个救援组织筹集资金。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 18岁的利亚·华盛顿和19岁的乔·普格，来自巴恩斯利，是6月2日“微笑者”游乐设施发生两辆车相撞事故时受伤的四名人员之一。华盛顿小姐的一条腿被截肢，普格先生的膝盖受到严重损伤。这次活动将于11月14日在巴恩斯利的Metrodome体育馆举行，包括豌豆和馅饼晚餐。中部空中救护队、皇家斯托克大学医院和斯塔福德郡消防救援队将从这次慈善活动中受益。来自兰开夏郡的维基·巴尔奇，也不得不截肢，而来自德比郡巴克斯顿的丹尼尔·索普则受到严重的腿部伤害。另外12人被困在离地25英尺（7.6米）的高处数小时，紧急服务人员试图营救他们。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 6月2日，Leah Washington和Joe Pugh在Smiler游乐设施相撞，导致两人截肢，12人被困高处数小时。11月14日，Metrodome Arena举办慈善活动，为伤者筹款。受益机构包括Midlands Air Ambulance，Royal Stoke University Hospital和Staffordshire Fire and Rescue。

xsum.src: the child was critically injured in the incident and later died in hospital . the freak accident happened at 15:00 local time -lrb- 19:00 gmt -rrb- on friday . the sun dial restaurant , where the incident took place , has reportedly been closed until further notice . according to a statement from atlanta police , the restaurant 's revolving floor automatically stopped moving when the child became stuck on friday . employees managed to dislodge the boy , who suffered crushing injuries to his head and brain , according to a report by the fulton county medical examiner . `` the kid was just wandering as kids will do . somehow he found himself in a critical situation where he 's lodged in between the rotating floor and the wall , '' police spokesman warren pickard told reporters on saturday . the boy 's death has been ruled accidental . the restaurant is located at the top of the westin hotel , an atlanta attraction that offers a 360-degree view of the city .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 周五，亚特兰大日晷(Sundial)餐厅的一名儿童被卡在旋转地板和墙壁之间而导致重伤后不治身亡，警方判定这是一起事故。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 一名儿童在一起意外事故中受重伤，后来在医院不治身亡。这起事故发生在当地时间15:00（格林威治时间19:00）的星期五。据报道，事故发生的太阳表餐厅已经暂时关闭。根据亚特兰大警方的声明，星期五当孩子被卡住时，餐厅的旋转地板自动停止运动。据富尔顿县医学检查官的报告，员工们设法解救了这名男孩，但他的头部和脑部受到了压伤。警方发言人沃伦·皮卡德在周六告诉记者：“孩子只是像孩子一样漫步。不知怎么的，他发现自己处于一个危险的境地，被夹在旋转地板和墙壁之间。”男孩的死亡被认定为意外。这家餐厅位于威斯汀酒店的顶楼，是亚特兰大的一个景点，可以欣赏到城市的360度全景。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 一名孩子在亚特兰大一家餐厅发生意外，被卡在旋转地板上，后来因受伤过重死亡。事发当地时间星期五下午3点，餐厅已被关闭。警方表示孩子是无意中被卡住，死因被认定为意外。

xsum.src: police and fire crews were called to the scene , close to lesmahagow , at about 10:30 on friday after a tanker carrying highly-flammable ethanol caught fire . no-one was injured as a result of the blaze . the motorway was closed in both directions for several hours , with queues of up to nine miles reported . about 100 firefighters were involved in efforts to extinguish the blaze . deputy assistant chief officer paul connelly , from the scottish fire and rescue service , said : `` the nature of the fuel involved in the fire meant it was both intense and very difficult to extinguish . `` large volumes of water were deployed from multiple jets and our crews also conducted several foam strikes to smother the flames . `` considerable resources were mobilised from across the west of scotland to conduct a safe and effective firefighting operation , which has ultimately seen the fire extinguished . he added : `` our crews will remain at the scene over the coming hours while the remaining ethanol is removed from the vehicle . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 周五，一辆运载乙醇的油罐车在高速公路上着火，大火持续了几个小时才被扑灭。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 周五上午10:30，警察和消防队员被召唤到位于莱斯马霍的事故现场，一辆运载高度易燃乙醇的罐车起火。幸运的是，没有人受伤。高速公路双向封闭数小时，最长排队达9英里。大约有100名消防员参与了灭火工作。苏格兰消防和救援服务的副助理总干事保罗·康奈利表示：“火灾中涉及的燃料性质使得灭火工作既强烈又困难。”“我们使用了大量水枪，并进行了多次泡沫打击来扑灭火焰。”“西苏格兰的大量资源被动员起来，进行安全有效的灭火工作，最终成功扑灭了火灾。”他补充道：“我们的队员将在接下来的几个小时内留在现场，将剩余的乙醇从车辆中移除。”
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 周五上午10:30，苏格兰高速公路发生一起油罐车起火事故，导致双向车道关闭，排队长达九英里。约100名消防员参与灭火，最终成功扑灭火灾。没有人受伤，消耗大量资源。

xsum.src: the most rev justin welby told worshippers at canterbury cathedral that the attacks risked `` causing us to act fearfully , to see a world in which fear triumphs '' . but he also said : `` on easter day hope decisively overcame fear '' . tuesday 's bombings in brussels killed 28 people and injured dozens . the archbishop said hope can seem far away and fear so close `` in the shadow of this week 's darkness '' . `` fear is reasonable , a normal human reaction , '' he added . pope delivers easter message of hope pm praises uk 's ` christian values ' `` easter proclaims to us in flesh and blood that fear and death and terror are not the last words . `` god has spoken life , hope and purpose . `` terror speaks of a world at war with itself , of faiths at each others ' throats . `` jesus christ reaches out not in exclusion but in embrace ; this is the feast of the victory of god , and we celebrate in the midst of darkness , by our worship and praise shining an unquenchable light . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 周二布鲁塞尔(Brussels)发生爆炸事件，造成 28 人死亡，数十人受伤，贾斯汀·韦尔比(Justin welby)鼓励坎特伯雷大教堂(Canterbury Cathedral)的信徒不要屈服于恐惧，而是通过敬拜和赞美来克服恐惧。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 坎特伯雷大教堂的贵格会大主教贾斯汀·韦尔比告诉教徒们，这些袭击“可能让我们害怕，看到一个恐惧战胜一切的世界”。但他也说：“复活节日，希望决然战胜了恐惧”。周二在布鲁塞尔发生的爆炸袭击造成28人死亡，数十人受伤。大主教说，在这周黑暗的阴影下，希望似乎遥不可及，恐惧却如此近在咫尺。“恐惧是合理的，是正常的人类反应，”他补充道。教皇发表复活节信息，赞扬英国的“基督教价值观”。“复活节向我们宣告，恐惧、死亡和恐怖不是最后的话语。”上帝已经说过生命、希望和目的。“恐怖讲述的是一个自相残杀、信仰相互对立的世界。”“耶稣基督不是排斥，而是拥抱；这是上帝的胜利盛宴，我们在黑暗中通过崇拜和赞美照耀着不灭的光芒庆祝。”
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 英国大主教在坎特伯雷大教堂的复活节信息中谴责布鲁塞尔爆炸事件，称恐惧不应战胜希望。教皇也发表复活节信息，呼吁团结。复活节带来希望，克服恐惧和死亡。

xsum.src: the attacker , a 27-year-old swiss man , also died on sunday , they said . five other people were hurt when the man set fire to the train and stabbed passengers in the attack on saturday . two of them , including a six-year-old child , are in a serious condition . police have said that , as yet , there is no indication of a political or terrorist motive for the attack . the attack occurred around 14:20 -lrb- 12:20 gmt -rrb- as the train was approaching salez station , between the towns of buchs and sennwald . several dozen passengers were on board at the time . in a statement -lrb- in german -rrb- , st gallen cantonal police said video evidence from inside the train showed the attacker , armed with a knife , pouring out a flammable liquid . six people - including the attacker - were injured . the seventh injured person was a man on the platform who pulled the burning attacker off the train . forensic experts are analysing the flammable liquid and the scene of the crime . police said the attacker lived in a canton adjoining st gallen . his address has been searched . on the basis of the video evidence , police say the man acted alone .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 周六，一名27岁的瑞士(Swiss)男子纵火焚烧一列火车并刺伤乘客，袭击者于周日死亡。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 周日，瑞士一名27岁的男子袭击了一列火车，造成自己和另外五人受伤，其中两人情况严重。警方表示，目前还没有迹象表明这次袭击有政治或恐怖主义动机。袭击发生在火车接近Salez站时，当时有几十名乘客在车上。警方称，从火车内部的视频证据可以看出，袭击者持刀并倒出易燃液体。六人受伤，包括袭击者在内。第七名受伤者是站台上的一名男子，他将燃烧的袭击者从火车上拉下来。法医专家正在分析易燃液体和犯罪现场。警方表示，袭击者住在圣加仑州的一个邻近州。他的住址已经被搜查。根据视频证据，警方称这名男子是独自行动的。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 周六，一名27岁的瑞士男子在火车上纵火并刺伤乘客，造成六人受伤，其中两人伤势严重。袭击者死亡，警方正在调查此事件，目前没有发现政治或恐怖主义动机。周日，警方发现袭击者是一名独自行动的男子。

xsum.src: 27 december 2016 last updated at 09:00 gmt german shepherd finn was injured early one october morning while protecting his handler from a suspected armed robber . the seven-year-old fought for survival , helped every step of the way by his handler pc dave wardell . bbc news looks back at how his recovery captured the hearts of thousands and inspired a petition calling on the government to re-think the laws surrounding injured police support animals .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 10月，一只7岁的德国牧羊犬芬因(Finn)为其饲养员挡住了抢劫者的袭击，饲养员呼吁政府重新考虑动物保护法。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 2016年12月27日，上午9点，德国牧羊犬芬恩在保护其处理人免受一名涉嫌持枪抢劫犯的袭击时受伤。这只七岁的狗狗为了生存而奋斗，每一步都得到了其处理人戴夫·沃德尔警官的帮助。BBC新闻回顾了他的康复过程，这感动了成千上万人，并激发了一项请愿，呼吁政府重新考虑有关受伤警察支持动物的法律。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 德国牧羊犬芬恩在保护处理人免受武装抢劫犯袭击时受伤，经过处理人PC戴夫·沃德尔的帮助，芬恩成功康复。此事件感动了众多人，并引发了一项请愿，呼吁政府改变受伤警察支持动物的法律。

xsum.src: sannah javid , 26 , of frank slater house , green lane , ilford , was taken to king george hospital on tuesday after officers were called to her flat . she died in the early hours of wednesday . post-mortem tests found the cause of death was multiple injuries . metropolitan police detectives believe ms javid knew her attacker . the force said a 37-year-old man was arrested on suspicion of her murder on saturday . det ch insp tim duffield added : `` we are appealing for anyone who may have seen or heard something suspicious on the evening of tuesday , 2 december to call the incident room at hendon . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 周二，26岁的桑娜·贾维德(Sanna Javed)在家中被杀，周六，一名37岁男子因涉嫌谋杀被捕。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 26岁的Sannah Javid住在伊尔福德的格林莱恩的弗兰克·斯莱特豪斯，周二被警察带到国王乔治医院，周三凌晨去世。验尸报告显示死因是多处伤势。伦敦警察厅的侦探们认为Javid女士认识她的袭击者。警方表示，一名37岁的男子于周六被逮捕，涉嫌谋杀。侦探队长蒂姆·达菲尔德补充说：“我们呼吁任何在12月2日周二晚上听到或看到可疑情况的人致电亨登的事件室。”
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 伦敦警方逮捕一名37岁男子，涉嫌谋杀26岁的Susannah Javid。Javid于12月2日晚被发现受伤，送往医院后不幸身亡。警方表示，Javid与嫌疑人认识。经过尸检，死因为多处伤势。调查仍在进行中。

xsum.src: jim mccafferty , 71 , appeared before belfast magistrates ' court charged with eight counts of touching a boy under the age of 16 . the crimes are alleged to have happened in belfast between 2012 and 2015 . mr mccafferty , who previously lived in glasgow and worked at celtic more than 20 years ago , was arrested last december . he was also a kit man for other scottish clubs , including falkirk and hibernian , before moving to northern ireland about seven years ago . mr mccafferty , who now has an address at raby street in south belfast , has been on remand at maghaberry prison amid fears for his safety . he was escorted into the dock on a walking frame for the hearing at belfast magistrates ' court on thursday . dressed in a white t-shirt and and grey tracksuit bottoms , the pensioner spoke to confirm he understood the allegations against him . the judge ordered his trial to be held at belfast crown court on a date to be fixed . no application for bail was made and he is expected to remain in custody until the proceedings get underway .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 71岁的吉姆·麦卡弗蒂(Jim McCafferty)因涉嫌性侵犯16岁以下儿童而受审。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 71岁的吉姆·麦卡菲蒂在贝尔法斯特地方法院出庭，被控8项涉嫌在2012年至2015年期间在贝尔法斯特触摸一名未满16岁的男孩。麦卡菲蒂先前居住在格拉斯哥，并在20多年前曾在凯尔特人俱乐部工作，去年12月被捕。他还曾担任其他苏格兰俱乐部的装备管理员，包括福尔柯克和希伯尼安，大约7年前搬到北爱尔兰。麦卡菲蒂现在住在南贝尔法斯特的拉比街，因为担心自己的安全，一直被关押在马哈贝里监狱。他在周四出庭时被押上步行架，身穿白色T恤和灰色运动裤，确认自己理解对他的指控。法官下令将他的审判安排在贝尔法斯特高等法院，具体日期待定。他没有申请保释，预计将在审判开始前一直被羁押。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 71岁的吉姆·麦卡弗蒂因涉嫌在2012-2015年期间在贝尔法斯特触摸16岁以下男孩而被捕。他曾在苏格兰多家俱乐部担任装备管理员，现被关押在马哈贝里监狱。他将在贝尔法斯特高等法院受审。

xsum.src: linton bridge , over the river wharfe in west yorkshire , was damaged in the christmas floods . emergency work has been undertaken but the cracked bridge between linton and collingham remains at risk of collapse , said leeds city council . work , which will cost # 4.5 m , is to start in july to put in place a river platform to work on the foundations . parts of the bridge dropped about 8in -lrb- 20cm -rrb- after the floodwater undermined its foundations . it has been shut since 27 december and the permanent repair works are expected to be completed by the summer of 2017 . more than 100 bridges were damaged by floods in west yorkshire and a bridge partially collapsed in tadcaster in north yorkshire . councillor richard lewis said : `` i think everyone now realises the challenge of repairing linton bridge is considerable and requires detailed and complex work , so is not something that can be done quickly . '' the meeting also decided not to put a temporary footbridge in place due to cost and environmental impact . a free shuttle bus service has been operating between linton and wetherby since january .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 林登桥(Linden Bridge)在圣诞节洪水中被毁，于12月27日关闭，预计修复工作将于2017年夏季完成。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 位于西约克郡河流沃夫河上的林顿桥在圣诞节洪水中受损。紧急修复工作已经展开，但林顿和科林厄姆之间的裂缝桥仍有倒塌的风险，利兹市议会表示。工程预计耗资450万英镑，将于7月开始，在河流上建立平台以便进行基础修复工作。洪水冲击导致桥梁部分下沉约8英寸（20厘米），自12月27日起就已关闭，永久修复工程预计将于2017年夏季完成。西约克郡有100多座桥梁受损，北约克郡的塔德卡斯特桥部分坍塌。市议员理查德·刘易斯表示：“我认为现在每个人都意识到修复林顿桥的挑战是巨大的，需要详细复杂的工作，因此不是一件能够迅速完成的事情。”会议还决定不建立临时人行桥，因为成本和环境影响。自1月起，林顿和韦瑟比之间已经开通了免费班车服务。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 西约克郡林顿桥在圣诞节洪水中受损，紧急工作进行，桥梁仍处于崩溃的风险。7月开始修复桥梁，预计2017年夏季完成。决定不设置临时步行桥，免费班车服务运行。

xsum.src: the city was brought to a standstill on 15 december last year when a gunman held 18 hostages for 17 hours . family members of victims tori johnson and katrina dawson were in attendance . images of the floral tributes that filled the city centre in the wake of the siege were projected on to the cafe and surrounding buildings in an emotional twilight ceremony . prime minister malcolm turnbull gave an address saying a `` whole nation resolved to answer hatred with love '' . `` testament to the spirit of australians is that with such unnecessary , thoughtless tragedy , an amazing birth of mateship , unity and love occurs . proud to be australian , '' he said . new south wales premier mike baird has also announced plans for a permanent memorial to be built into the pavement in martin place . clear cubes containing flowers will be embedded into the concrete and will shine with specialised lighting . it is a project inspired by the massive floral tributes that were left in the days after the siege . `` something remarkable happened here . as a city we were drawn to martin place . we came in shock and in sorrow but every step we took was with purpose , '' he said on tuesday .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 悉尼(Sydney)市在马丁广场(Martin Place)举行仪式，悼念去年12月围攻事件的受害者，并宣布在人行道上建造一座永久纪念碑。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 去年12月15日，一名持枪歹徒劫持了18名人质，导致城市陷入瘫痪。受害者家属Tori Johnson和Katrina Dawson出席了纪念仪式。在情感激荡的黄昏仪式上，市中心充满了鲜花悼念的影像被投射到咖啡馆和周围建筑物上。总理马尔科姆·特恩布尔发表讲话，称“整个国家决心用爱来回应仇恨”。他说：“澳大利亚人的精神就是这样，面对这种不必要的、无思考的悲剧，一种惊人的友谊、团结和爱的诞生发生了。我为自己是澳大利亚人而感到自豪。”新南威尔士州州长迈克·贝尔德也宣布计划在马丁广场的人行道上建造一个永久纪念碑。透明的立方体中嵌入鲜花，并配备专门的灯光。这个项目是受到劫持事件后几天留下的大规模鲜花悼念的启发。他在周二说：“这里发生了一件非凡的事情。作为一个城市，我们被马丁广场吸引。我们来的时候是震惊和悲伤的，但每一步都是有目的的。”
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 2014年12月15日，悉尼市中心发生枪击事件，枪手挟持18名人质长达17小时。总理马尔科姆·特恩布尔和新南威尔士州州长迈克·贝尔德宣布建造永久纪念碑，以纪念受害者。澳大利亚人通过友爱、团结和爱心的行动展现出来。

xsum.src: the 30-year-old , excluded from the world championships by usa swimming after a drink-drive conviction , won in one minute 54.75 seconds in texas . phelps , an 18-time olympic champion , also recorded the year 's fastest times to win the 100m and 200m butterfly . ryan lochte won world 200m individual medley gold in 1:55.81 on thursday . american lochte , 31 , also holds the world record for the event of 1:54.00 , which he swam in 2011 . `` ryan and i have been pretty dominant in that race since we started racing back in 2004 , '' said phelps . `` i 'm looking forward to getting back in and competing with him . `` i 've been away from the sport for a while and i feel like i 'm kind of back where i used to be . it 's good to be here . '' on saturday , phelps won the 100m butterfly in 50.45 seconds , faster than the 50.56 south african chad le clos swam to win world gold on the same day . a day earlier , phelps won the american 200m butterfly title in one minute 52.94 seconds in san antonio - 0.54 secs faster than hungary 's laszlo cseh swam in winning the world title in kazan , russia . phelps , who was convicted of drink-driving in december and served a six-month ban from competition , now has a record 55 national titles .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 迈克尔·菲尔普斯(Michael Phelps)在去年12月因酒后驾驶被禁赛六个月后，继续赢得了上周的100米和200米蝶泳比赛。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 美国游泳协会因为酒驾罪名而被排除出世界锦标赛的30岁选手在德克萨斯州以1分54.75秒的成绩获胜。18届奥运冠军菲尔普斯也在100米和200米蝶泳项目上创下今年最快的成绩。31岁的美国选手罗切特在周四以1分55.81秒获得了世界200米个人混合泳的金牌。他也保持着该项目的世界纪录，于2011年创下了1分54秒的成绩。菲尔普斯表示：“自从我们2004年开始比赛以来，我和罗切特一直在这个项目上占据主导地位。”他还说：“我很期待能够重新回到赛场和他竞争。我离开游泳界有一段时间了，现在感觉回到了从前的状态，很高兴能够回来。”周六，菲尔普斯以50.45秒的成绩赢得了100米蝶泳冠军，比南非选手乔德·勒克洛斯在同一天赢得世界冠军的50.56秒还要快。一天前，菲尔普斯在圣安东尼奥以1分52.94秒的成绩赢得了美国200米蝶泳冠军，比匈牙利选手拉斯洛·切赫在俄罗斯喀山赢得世界冠军时的成绩快了0.54秒。菲尔普斯去年12月被判酒驾罪名，被禁赛六个月，现在已经拥有55项国家冠军纪录。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 迈克尔·菲尔普斯在美国游泳协会禁赛后重返比赛，赢得200米和100米蝶泳比赛，打破自己的国家纪录。他与瑞安·洛赫特的竞争备受关注，两人在2004年开始竞争，至今仍是该项目的主宰。

xsum.src: seamus mccollum , 56 , died at maine private nursing home in randalstown in september of last year . however , the death was not treated as murder until april of this year , following the results of an autopsy . mr mccollum had cerebral palsy and had lived at the care home for nine years . police said the woman was being questioned at antrim psni station .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 希莫斯·麦科勒姆(Sheamus McCollum)去年9月在疗养院去世，今年4月被认为死于谋杀。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 去年九月，56岁的西莫斯·麦克卢姆在兰达尔斯敦的一家私人养老院去世。然而，直到今年四月，经过尸检，他的死亡才被视为谋杀。麦克卢姆患有脑瘫，已经在这家护理院生活了九年。警方表示，一名女子正在安特里姆警察局接受询问。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 去年9月，56岁的Seamus McCollum在缅因州私人护理院去世，直到今年4月验尸结果出来，死亡才被视为谋杀。一名女子在安特里姆PSNI警察局接受询问。

xsum.src: on 14 april 1945 , just a month before the end of world war two , 10 us servicemen and one woman died after their flying fortress bomber crashed in the isle of man . lt robert vielle , an experienced and decorated pilot , had been flying a b-17g from england to northern ireland when he hit bad weather over the irish sea . the aircraft veered off-course by several miles before coming down and bursting into flames in a field above port st may . the exact cause of the crash has never been ascertained . those on board had been sent on a peaceful mission to northern ireland to collect supplies of whiskey for a party at the us army air force station at thurleigh in essex . ivor ramsden , a keen historian and aviation expert , said the flight was an example of the `` sheer madness of war '' .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 1945年4月14日，一架派往北爱尔兰(Northern Ireland)执行和平任务的轰炸机在马恩(Man)岛坠毁，造成11人死亡；事故的确切原因尚未确定。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 1945年4月14日，第二次世界大战即将结束前一个月，10名美国军人和一名女性在马恩岛坠毁的飞行堡垒轰炸机上丧生。经验丰富且获得荣誉的飞行员罗伯特·维尔在从英国飞往北爱尔兰的途中遇到恶劣天气，导致飞机偏离航线数英里后坠毁并在圣梅港上方的田地起火。坠机原因至今仍未确定。机上人员被派往北爱尔兰执行和平任务，收集威士忌供英格兰埃塞克斯郡图勒镇的美国陆军航空军基地的派对使用。历史学家和航空专家伊沃尔·拉姆斯登表示，这次飞行是战争的``纯粹疯狂''的一个例子。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 1945年4月14日，一架B-17G轰炸机在马恩岛坠毁，导致10名美国军人和一名女性死亡。坠机原因不明，飞行目的是为了在英格兰举办派对。这次坠机是战争的悲剧。

xsum.src: the couple married in the 28-year-old tennis star 's hometown of dunblane in april . it is understood that kim , 27 , has recently had her 12-week scan , with the baby due in february . murray 's mother judy recently told a magazine that she was `` really looking forward to being a granny '' . murray enjoyed a strong run of form after marrying his long-term girlfriend in front of family and friends at dunblane cathedral on 11 april . he reached the semi-finals of the french open and wimbledon , and won his first titles on clay . speaking to sky sports earlier this year , he said : `` it -lrb- marriage -rrb- has been nice and a lot of people have spoken about the honeymoon period . `` but we 've been together a very long time and getting married was the next step . '' murray fans were quick to congratulate the couple after news of the pregnancy was reported , tweeting him their best wishes .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 28岁的网球运动员安迪·穆雷(Andy Murray)今年4月在邓布兰大教堂(Dunblane Cathedral)与妻子结婚，他们的孩子预计将于明年2月出生。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 28岁的网球明星在他的家乡邓布兰4月结婚。据悉，27岁的金最近进行了12周的检查，预产期在2月。穆雷的母亲朱迪最近告诉一家杂志，她“非常期待成为一个奶奶”。穆雷在和家人朋友一起在邓布兰大教堂举行婚礼后，表现出色，进入了法网和温网的半决赛，并赢得了他在红土上的首个冠军。他今年早些时候接受天空体育采访时说：“结婚后一切都很好，很多人都谈论蜜月期。”“但我们在一起已经很长时间了，结婚是下一步。”穆雷的粉丝听到怀孕的消息后迅速祝贺这对夫妇，通过推特向他们表达了最美好的祝愿。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 网球明星安迪·穆雷和妻子金·西尔斯将在二月迎来第一个孩子。他们在四月在穆雷的家乡邓布兰举行婚礼。穆雷在结婚后取得了不错的成绩，包括进入法网和温网的半决赛，并在红土赛季获得首个冠军。穆雷的母亲朱迪·穆雷也表示期待成为奶奶。

xsum.src: the city council says 500 self-service bikes will be located across the city from april 2017 . a previous pilot scheme , which saw 70 bikes installed at 10 locations , ended in 2011 . ramesh patel , cabinet member for transport , planning and sustainability , said : `` the new scheme intends to be far larger that the initial pilot scheme . `` the bikes will be based at a number of easily accessed sites including hire stations at district centres , universities and other strategic locations close to existing public transport facilities . '' the council wants to secure a provider to supply , maintain and operate the scheme , which it says , will be financed through sponsorship income and at no cost to the taxpayer . ` boris bikes ' were launched in london in 2010 , with bikes being hired from any docking station using debit or credit cards . they can later be returned to any empty docking point . the scheme has since been rolled out to a number of cities across the country .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 市议会决定从2017年4月开始在该市启动公共自行车租赁试点项目。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 市议会表示，从2017年4月开始，将在全市范围内设置500辆自助服务自行车。此前的试点计划于2011年结束，共安装了70辆自行车，分布在10个地点。交通、规划和可持续发展委员会成员拉梅什·帕特尔表示：“新计划的规模将远远超过最初的试点计划。”这些自行车将设在一些易于到达的地点，包括区中心、大学和其他靠近现有公共交通设施的战略位置的租赁站点。”市议会希望能够找到一家供应商来提供、维护和运营该计划，它表示该计划将通过赞助收入来融资，不会给纳税人带来任何费用。2010年，伦敦推出了“鲍里斯自行车”，使用借记卡或信用卡可以从任何停靠站租用自行车，之后可以将其还回任何空的停靠点。该计划随后在全国多个城市推广。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 伦敦自助服务自行车计划将于2017年4月在该市推出，共有500辆自行车，通过赞助收入融资，对纳税人免费。此前的试点计划于2011年结束，市议会希望通过寻找供应商将计划扩展到多个城市。

xsum.src: the couple , from halstead , suffered `` life-changing '' injuries during `` two hours of torture '' on 26 april . kent police said the woman remains in a critical condition and the man is still being treated for his injuries . the couple were told family members would be killed if they did not give the gang what they wanted . the computer-generated image was created with the help of one of the victims . it shows a black man of medium height , possibly aged in his 20s , with cropped black hair . `` although the suspects tried to conceal their identities , we have been able to get a very detailed description of one of the men , '' sgt simon harrold said . he added that they were continuing to follow a number of lines of inquiry to find the people `` responsible for this shocking crime . '' the break-in happened at the house off london road , at 21:00 bst on 26 april . three men fled the scene with a `` quantity of cash '' at about 23:00 . one was black and about 5ft 10in -lrb- 1.7 m -rrb- tall . the other two men were white . all three wore dark clothing .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 4月26日，三名男子闯入一对霍尔斯特德(Holstead)夫妇的家中实施抢劫，并对夫妇俩施以酷刑，致两人受伤，警方正在调查嫌疑人。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 4月26日，来自哈尔斯特德的一对夫妇遭受了“两小时的折磨”，导致“改变生活”的伤害。肯特警方表示，女性仍处于危急状态，男性仍在接受治疗。夫妇被告知如果不给予团伙想要的东西，家人将会被杀害。受害者之一帮助创建了一张电脑生成的图像，显示一名黑人男子，身高中等，可能年龄在20多岁，留着短黑发。警长西蒙·哈罗德表示：“尽管嫌疑人试图掩盖自己的身份，但我们已经得到了一名男子非常详细的描述。”他补充说，他们正在继续追踪多条线索，以找到“负责这起令人震惊的犯罪”的人。这起入室抢劫发生在伦敦路附近的一所房子，于当地时间21:00发生。三名男子于当地时间23:00左右带走了“一笔现金”。其中一名男子是黑人，身高约5英尺10英寸（1.7米），另外两名男子是白人。三人都穿着黑色衣服。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 4月26日，肯特警察称一对夫妇遭受两小时的折磨，入室抢劫，女性仍处于危急状态，男性仍在接受治疗。警方正在跟踪调查线索，制作了一张电脑生成的嫌疑人图像。一定数量的现金被盗，警方正在寻找负责这起犯罪的嫌疑人。

xsum.src: the blaze started at the icl uk boulby mine at 00:30 bst on 13 april , 1,100 m -lrb- 3,600 ft -rrb- under the sea bed and five miles -lrb- 8km -rrb- from land . seven workers were taken to hospital and treated for smoke inhalation . the health and safety executive -lrb- hse -rrb- said a notice had been served in relation to the underground fire . more than 100 staff were underground at the time , 11 of whom were temporarily unaccounted for . polystyrene blocks are believed to have caught fire in the mine . a spokesman for icl uk , said : `` we have been working closely with hm mines inspectorate in the investigation into the recent incident . `` safety is always our first priority and we are fully committed to working with the inspectorate in order to identify ways in which procedures can be improved . `` we will , of course comply with all the measures set out in the improvement notice . '' the company has until 27 june to comply with the notice . the hse said the investigation was ongoing . one of europe 's deepest mines , the site employs about 1,100 people . last year , the company announced it was shedding hundreds of jobs as part of a `` new business strategy '' to produce fertiliser polysulphate .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 4月13日，以色列化工集团(ICL)英国公司的(博尔比)boulby矿场发生火灾，造成7名工人因吸入烟雾受伤，另外11人仍下落不明，英国健康与安全执行局(UK Health and Safety Executive)正在进一步完善安全举措。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 4月13日凌晨00:30，英国ICL UK博尔比矿发生火灾，深度达1100米（3600英尺），距离陆地8公里（5英里）。7名工人因吸入烟雾而送医治疗。英国卫生与安全执行局（HSE）表示已发出一项关于地下火灾的通知。事发时有100多名员工在地下工作，其中11人暂时失联。据信，矿井内的聚苯乙烯块起火。ICL UK的发言人表示：“我们一直与矿山检查局密切合作，调查最近的事故。安全始终是我们的首要任务，我们完全致力于与检查局合作，找出改进程序的方法。我们当然会遵守改进通知中的所有措施。”公司必须在6月27日前遵守该通知。HSE表示调查仍在进行中。作为欧洲最深的矿井之一，该矿场雇用约1100人。去年，该公司宣布裁员数百人，作为“新的业务战略”生产肥料多硫酸盐。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 英国ICL UK Boulby矿山发生火灾，7名工人受伤，11名工人暂时失踪。HSE发出通知，要求改善安全程序。公司宣布裁员。调查仍在进行中。

xsum.src: graham dwyer , 42 , from the foxrock suburb of south dublin , pleaded not guilty to the murder of elaine o'hara . the remains of ms o'hara , 36 , were found in the dublin mountains on 13 september 2013 . she was last seen on 22 august 2012 , the day of her alleged murder , near shanganagh cemetery in south dublin . the judge said 40 days of evidence , stretching back over five years , boils down to what happened in the three hours after ms o'hara vanished . he told the seven men and five women they could take as long or as short a time as they needed to reach `` a conscientious and properly considered verdict '' .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 格雷厄姆·德怀尔(Graham Dwyer)对2012年8月22日伊莱恩·奥哈拉(Erin O'Hara)女士的谋杀案表示不认罪。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 格雷厄姆·德怀尔，42岁，来自都柏林南部福克斯洛克郊区，对谋杀埃莱恩·奥哈拉的指控表示不认罪。奥哈拉女士，36岁，遗骸于2013年9月13日在都柏林山区被发现。她最后一次出现在2012年8月22日，也是她被指控谋杀的那天，靠近都柏林南部的山甘纳墓地。法官表示，长达40天的证据，跨越五年，归结为奥哈拉女士消失后的三个小时发生了什么。他告诉七名男子和五名女子，他们可以花费任意长或任意短的时间来做出“认真和充分考虑的裁决”。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 2013年9月13日，福克斯洛克的格雷厄姆·德怀尔被控谋杀伊莲娜·奥哈拉。奥哈拉遗骸在都柏林山脉被发现，她最后一次被看到是在2012年8月22日。经历了五年的审判，德怀尔不认罪。

xsum.src: the company said it was looking at the possibility of adding services between sandown and southsea . it said the idea had come from businesses at the island resort who were keen to boost tourism . if confirmed , the cross-solent service would operate on two days a week in july and august . neil chapman , managing director of hovertravel , said : `` we 're always open to new ideas which might boost tourism to the isle of wight and we provisionally agreed the concept , subject to gaining the appropriate permissions . '' the plan would be for the service to operate four 25-minute crossings every tuesday and thursday from 14 july to 27 august . the isle of wight council welcomed the plan and said it was currently in discussion with hovertravel to finalise the details and the use of sandown beach for the service .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 运营商hovertravel表示，今年夏天将增加怀特(Wight)岛的新旅游，以促进该岛的旅游业。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 该公司表示正在考虑在桑敦和南海之间增加服务的可能性。它说这个想法来自岛上度假胜地的企业，他们热衷于促进旅游业。如果确认，跨索伦特服务将在7月和8月的两天运营。霍弗特拉维尔的总经理尼尔·查普曼说：“我们总是对可能促进怀特岛旅游的新想法持开放态度，我们暂时同意了这个概念，但需要获得适当的许可。”计划是从7月14日到8月27日，每周二和周四运营四次25分钟的渡轮。怀特岛议会欢迎这一计划，并表示目前正在与霍弗特拉维尔商讨最终细节和在桑敦海滩使用服务的事宜。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Hovertravel公司计划在7月和8月每周两天开通Sandown和Southsea之间的跨索伦特服务，以促进Isle of Wight的旅游业。Isle of Wight Council已同意该提议，并正在与Hovertravel商讨细节和使用Sandown海滩的事宜。

xsum.src: leah kerry was found unconscious at about 04:50 bst on saturday at bakers park in newton abbot , devon . jacob khanlarian from newton abbot , was charged with two counts of intent to supply a class a drug and one of intent to supply a class b substance . the 20-year-old entered no plea and was remanded in custody by plymouth magistrates . he will appear before exeter crown court on 10 august . more on the drug-related death and other devon news it is believed leah , who was not from the area , suffered an adverse reaction from the substance . she died in torbay hospital . two other girls believed to have taken the same substance were also taken to hospital over the weekend as a precaution , but have since been released . det supt ken lamont said : `` with nps -lrb- new psychoactive substances -rrb- no-one knows what 's in them and that 's why they are so dangerous . `` time and time again we hear of people paying the ultimate price for this . `` it 's not worth experimenting with your life . '' last year totnes teenager nathan wood died after after taking the psychoactive drug n-bomb . police called on parents to `` speak to your children about the dangers of drugs and legal highs '' .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 周六凌晨， 莉娅·克里(Leah Kerry)被发现死于毒品，雅各布·汗拉里安(Jacob Khanlarian)将于8月10日出庭，罪名是供应毒品。
