xsum.gpt3_summary: 在英国德文郡的牛顿阿伯特市的贝克斯公园，20岁的杰克布·汗拉里安被指控两项意图供应A类毒品和一项意图供应B类物质的罪名。他被普利茅斯地方法院拘留，将于8月10日出庭受审。据信，不是当地人的莉娅·凯利在周末04:50被发现昏迷，可能是由于服用了这种物质。她在托尔贝医院去世。另外两名据信也服用了同样的物质的女孩也被送往医院作为预防措施，但已经出院。警方表示，这种新型精神活性物质的成分无人知晓，因此非常危险。去年，托特内斯的青少年内森·伍德因服用新型精神活性物质N-Bomb而死亡。警方呼吁家长们与孩子谈论毒品和合法高效物质的危险。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 英国德文郡新顿阿伯特的Bakers公园发生一起毒品相关的死亡事件，20岁的Jacob Khanlarian被控与此有关。警方警告毒品和合法高潮的危险性，呼吁家长与孩子谈论此事。另外两名女孩也因服用相同物质被送往医院。

xsum.src: glen evans was left with a broken nose and his bride georgina was punched at fanhams hall hotel in hertfordshire , st albans crown court heard . lee doyle , 37 , of houghton regis denied punching the groom . he and gary hutson , 46 , of luton , both charged with affray , were guests at another wedding . both deny affray on 10 august 2014 . the court heard an argument broke out when mr doyle and mr hutson asked mr and mrs evans and their friends to move away from a fireplace . the newly married couple and their group were having drinks at the hotel following their own reception at another hotel . mr evans said the two men and the other groom confronted him , saying the area was reserved , although his party had been put there by bar staff . he said the two men hit him , and he was kicked and punched by others who joined in the attack . mrs evans was then also punched , leaving her with bruising to the head . however , mr doyle told the court he was trying to defuse the situation , which he described as `` volatile '' . he admitted pushing mr evans and `` grappling '' with him as he thought he was going to attack mr hutson . mr doyle described mr evans as `` irate and aggressive '' but denied hitting him . earlier this week mr evans denied allegations that he had thrown the first punch and had been `` aggressive '' .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 2014年8月10日，新郎格伦·埃文斯(Glenn Evans)和新娘乔治娜(Georgina)在婚礼上被两名争吵的男子袭击；两人都已被指控，但否认袭击过任何人。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 在赫特福德郡的Fanhams Hall酒店，新郎格伦·埃文斯被打断了鼻子，新娘乔治娜也被打了。37岁的李·多伊尔和46岁的加里·哈特森被控参与了这起暴力事件，他们是另一场婚礼的客人。2014年8月10日，他们被控参与了一起暴力事件。法庭听说，当多伊尔和哈特森要求埃文斯夫妇和他们的朋友离开壁炉时，发生了争吵。新婚夫妇和他们的朋友在酒店喝酒，他们自己的婚礼在另一家酒店举行。埃文斯先生说，两个男人和另一个新郎冲着他，说这个区域是保留的，尽管他们的团队是被酒吧工作人员安排在那里的。他说，两个男人打了他，其他人也加入了袭击，踢了他，打了他。埃文斯夫人也被打了，头部受了伤。然而，多伊尔告诉法庭，他试图平息这种“不稳定”的局面。他承认推了埃文斯先生，与他“扭打”，因为他认为他要袭击哈特森先生。多伊尔先生描述埃文斯先生为“暴躁和挑衅”，但否认打了他。本周早些时候，埃文斯先生否认了他先打人和“挑衅”的指控。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 2014年8月10日，格伦·埃文斯和他的新婚妻子在酒店庆祝婚礼时，与另一场婚礼的客人李·多伊尔和加里·哈特森发生争吵。格伦·埃文斯被打断鼻子，妻子也受伤。李·多伊尔和加里·哈特森否认暴乱罪。

xsum.src: jamie spendiff 's attack on craig logie , who was out with friends on a stag night , was captured on cctv . spendiff took part in a further assault on other men with a co-accused after killing the married 36-year-old last august . spendiff , 26 , was remanded in custody ahead of sentencing in july . in cctv footage shown to the high court in edinburgh , mr logie could be seen lying motionless on the ground after the assault . advocate depute andrew brown qc told the court : `` witnesses speak to hearing the sound of a crack as the deceased 's head hit the ground and he did not move thereafter . '' the construction manager suffered a brain injury and fracture to the back of his head following the attack at friars street on 7 august . spendiff , of cullercoats , north tyneside , admitted assaulting and killing mr logie by punching him on the head causing him to fall to the ground where he struck his head . he also pled guilty to committing a breach of the peace along with shaun mccarthy by conducting themselves in a disorderly manner and fighting with others . both also pled guilty to assaulting paul stubberfield and stuart mckee in a taxi in friars street . the court heard that spendiff and mccarthy had gone out drinking for the evening after working together as technicians on wind turbines . mr brown said that everyone appeared to be in good spirits , but a member of the stag party and another drinker then became involved in a heated argument . after patrons left the pub , a general melee broke out which ended with the fatal blow to mr logie . mr brown said : `` spendiff punched the deceased , who again had his arms up and out to the side , once on the face with force causing him to collapse to the ground . `` he swung another punch at the deceased as he fell but missed . `` with the deceased now on the ground spendiff initially moved away before returning and danced round the deceased , at all times being moved away by the accused mccarthy and at one stage a female passer-by . '' mark stewart qc , for spendiff , said the killer had expressed his sorrow for the victim and his family . judge lady stacey remanded both accused in custody , saying the culpable homicide charge had `` led to tragic consequences and a man has lost his life '' .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 杰米·斯彭德洛夫(Jamie Spendlove)于8月7日在弗莱尔斯街(Friars Street )袭击并杀害了一名男子，他于7月被指控犯有过失杀人罪，并被还押候审。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 文章：杰米·斯彭迪夫对克雷格·洛吉的袭击，后者当时与朋友在度假夜晚，被监控摄像头拍下。斯彭迪夫与另一名共同被告在去年8月杀害这位已婚36岁的男子后，还参与了对其他男子的进一步袭击。26岁的斯彭迪夫被拘留在监狱，等待7月的判决。在爱丁堡高等法院播放的监控录像中，洛吉先生在袭击后躺在地上一动不动。检察官安德鲁·布朗德大律师告诉法庭：“目击者称听到一声脆响，因为被告的头部撞击地面，之后他就没有动弹了。”这位建筑经理在8月7日的弗莱尔斯街遭受袭击后，遭受了脑损伤和头部骨折。来自北泰恩赛德的斯彭迪夫承认通过击打他的头部使他倒地，导致他死亡。他还承认与肖恩·麦卡锡一起犯下了违反和平的罪行，通过以混乱的方式行事并与他人打斗。两人还承认在弗莱尔斯街的一辆出租车上袭击了保罗·斯塔伯菲尔德和斯图尔特·麦基。法庭听说，斯彭迪夫和麦卡锡在一起工作后，晚上一起出去喝酒。布朗德先生说，当时每个人似乎都情绪高涨，但一名度假派对成员和另一名酒客却卷入了激烈的争吵。在顾客离开酒吧后，一场混战爆发，最终导致洛吉先生遭受致命一击。布朗德先生说：“斯彭迪夫用力击打了双臂向上伸展的洛吉先生的脸部，导致他倒地。他在洛吉先生倒地时又挥了一拳，但没有击中。洛吉先生倒地后，斯彭迪夫最初离开，然后又回来，在洛吉先生周围跳舞，一直被被告麦卡锡和一名女性路人拉开。”马克·斯图尔特大律师代表斯彭迪夫说，杀手已经表达了对受害者及其家人的悲痛。法官斯泰西夫人将两名被告都拘留在监狱，称“过失杀人罪导致了悲剧性后果，一个人失去了生命”。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 2017年8月，Jamie Spendiff和共同被告在苏格兰爱丁堡高等法院被控袭击Craig Logie和其他男子，其中Craig Logie因致命一击而死亡。被告被拘留，等待7月的判决。

xsum.src: 8 october 2013 last updated at 17:01 bst the taliban have tried to stop women and girls getting an education in swat , the area of pakistan where malala lived . malala has recovered and continues to campaign for education - but there are still people back home in pakistan who are n't happy about that . newsround reporter nel went to birmingham to meet malala and find out how her life has changed .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 塔利班(Taliban)试图阻止斯瓦特(Swat)的妇女和女孩接受教育，但马拉拉(Malala)仍然致力于教育运动。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 巴基斯坦斯瓦特地区的塔利班试图阻止妇女和女孩接受教育，马拉拉生活的地方。马拉拉已经康复，并继续为教育发起运动，但在巴基斯坦仍有人不满意。新闻轮播记者内尔去伯明翰会见马拉拉，了解她的生活如何改变。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 马拉拉·优素福扎伊是巴基斯坦一位为教育发声的女孩，2012年10月9日遭到塔利班枪击，但她康复后继续为教育发起运动。2013年10月8日，她与新闻记者会面，谈及她的生活变化和巴基斯坦部分人的反对。

xsum.src: gwent police said it was `` extremely concerned '' after five incidents potentially linked to heroin were reported between 23 october and friday . they happened in caerphilly , newport and blaenau gwent . det insp leigh mears said he `` can not rule out the possibility that the deaths and the medical emergencies are linked to the same batch of heroin '' . he added : `` the use of heroin is of course illegal , but i would urge anyone using the drug to be especially cautious and vigilant . `` if they experience any unusual symptoms after taking drugs , they should seek medical attention immediately . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 10 月 23 日至周五期间，警方对海洛因的使用发出了警告，此前已有 5 人死亡以及可能由海洛因引起的医疗紧急情况。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 根据警方的说法，格温特警察局对于五起与海洛因有关的事件表示“极度关注”，这些事件发生在10月23日至周五期间，发生在卡菲利、纽波特和布莱瑙格温特。调查主任利·米尔斯表示，他“不能排除死亡和医疗紧急情况与同一批海洛因有关的可能性”。他补充说：“海洛因的使用当然是非法的，但我呼吁任何使用这种药物的人要特别谨慎和警惕。”“如果他们在服用药物后出现任何异常症状，应立即寻求医疗帮助。”
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: Gwent警方报告了五起可能与海洛因有关的事件，发生在Caerphilly，Newport和Blaenau Gwent。警方敦促使用海洛因的人要谨慎，如果出现异常症状，应立即寻求医疗帮助。10月23日，星期五，警方表示无法排除这些事件与同一批海洛因有关的可能性。

xsum.src: susie , a 12-year-old collie and jilly , a 10-year-old cairn terrier , were taken in by snowdonia animal sanctuary after 72-year-old jennifer taylor was killed in a crash near betws-y-coed . sanctuary owner anne de berry said the dogs were moved to a `` brilliant '' new home on tuesday . `` they have a new mum and dad . it 's fantastic , '' she said . '' -lsb- the new owners -rsb- had a dog which had to be put down a month ago due to old age . `` one of our volunteers went to do the home check this morning and text me : ` brilliant ' . it 's a brilliant home . '' the dogs ' owner mrs taylor lived in dolgarrog . she was the passenger on a bmw bike when it collided with a nissan qashqai on the a470 close to waterloo bridge in the town on 4 october .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 10月4日，72岁的詹妮弗·泰勒(Jennifer Taylor)在一场车祸中丧生，她的两只狗被斯诺登尼亚(Snowdonia Animal Sanctuary)动物保护区收养。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 12岁的柯利犬Susie和10岁的凯恩梗犬Jilly在Jennifer Taylor发生车祸身亡后被送往Snowdonia动物保护区。保护区主人Anne de Berry表示，这两只狗狗已经在周二被送往一家“极好”的新家。“他们有了新的爸爸妈妈，太棒了！”新主人之前的狗狗因为年老而不得不安乐死。保护区的一名志愿者今天早上去做家庭检查，发来短信说：“太棒了！”这是一个极好的家。“Taylor太太住在Dolgarrog，她是10月4日在镇上的Waterloo桥附近，乘坐宝马摩托车时与尼桑Qashqai相撞的乘客。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 12岁的苏西和10岁的吉莉因主人詹妮弗·泰勒在事故中去世，被送往斯诺登尼亚动物保护区。志愿者帮助找到了一对新主人，两只狗狗在10月4日搬到了新家。

xsum.src: british transport police said the 15-year-old was attacked by a man and woman in their 40s . the incident happened at patterton station at about 23:30 on saturday 3 october . the teenager was punched from behind and stamped on as he lay on the ground , suffering facial injuries , including an injury to his eye . he did not require hospital treatment . his mobile phone was also stolen . the boy had been with a group of friends on the 23:05 service between glasgow central and neilston . det con ryan tierney , of british transport police , said : `` this would have been a busy service and i am aware there was an altercation between the group of younger boys and a group of older people shortly before the assault took place at patterton . `` anyone who was on the train and has information regarding those involved who remained on until it arrived at neilston at 23:40 is urged to get in touch as a matter of urgency . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 10月3日晚，一名青少年被一对40多岁的男女袭击抢劫，导致其面部和眼睛受伤，警方正在调查肇事者信息。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 英国交通警察表示，一名15岁的男孩在周六10月3日晚上23:30左右在帕特顿站遭到一对40多岁男女的袭击。这名男孩被从背后袭击并踩在地上，导致面部受伤，包括眼部受伤。他没有需要住院治疗。他的手机也被偷走了。这名男孩当时和一群朋友一起乘坐23:05从格拉斯哥中央到尼尔斯顿的列车。英国交通警察的瑞安·蒂尔尼探员说：“这趟列车当时应该很拥挤，我知道在帕特顿发生袭击之前，年轻男孩组和一群年长人之间发生了争吵。”“任何当时在列车上并且有关于那些参与者的信息，并且一直坐到23:40抵达尼尔斯顿的人都被敦促尽快联系我们。”
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 一名15岁男孩在格拉斯哥中央和尼尔斯顿之间的火车上被一对40多岁的男女袭击和抢劫。他的手机被偷，面部受伤。警方呼吁目击者提供信息。事件发生在10月3日23:30，受害者在Patterton车站下车。

xsum.src: the 79-year-old was held on monday on suspicion of murdering 14-year-old elsie frost in october 1965 . elsie was stabbed to death in a tunnel beneath a railway line in wakefield the bbc understands the arrested man is peter pickering , who was first questioned in connection with the murder in 2016 . he was arrested near newbury , in berkshire . the man is also being questioned in relation to an unconnected allegation of a rape and kidnap in 1972 . elsie was murdered as she walked home from her school 's sailing club , close to the river calder and the calder and hebble canal . the west yorkshire police homicide and major enquiries team re-opened its investigation into her death after a series of reports on bbc radio 4 . mr pickering was originally arrested in september before being bailed . police said he had been re-arrested after fresh evidence was uncovered . the allegations of the 1972 rape and kidnap are understood to have emerged during the course of their investigation into elsie 's death .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 周一，一名79岁男子因涉嫌在1965年谋杀一名14岁女学生而第二次被捕。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 79岁的一名男子周一因涉嫌1965年10月谋杀14岁的埃尔西·弗罗斯特而被拘留。埃尔西在韦克菲尔德一条铁路隧道下被刺死。据BBC了解，被捕的男子是彼得·皮克林，他在2016年首次被询问与谋杀案有关。他被逮捕时在伯克郡的纽伯里附近。这名男子还因1972年的一起强奸和绑架指控而接受审讯。埃尔西在她从学校帆船俱乐部回家的路上被谋杀，靠近卡尔德河和卡尔德和赫布尔运河。西约克郡警方的谋杀和重大调查小组在BBC广播4台的一系列报道后重新调查了她的死亡。皮克林先前于9月被逮捕，后来被保释。警方表示，他们发现了新的证据后重新逮捕了他。据了解，1972年的强奸和绑架指控是在调查埃尔西死亡期间出现的。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 79岁男子Peter Pickering因涉嫌1965年谋杀14岁的Elsie Frost被逮捕。西约克郡警方重新调查后发现新证据，同时还涉嫌1972年的强奸和绑架。调查仍在进行中。

xsum.src: the northern ireland international , 28 , was charged on 29 july with breaching fa rule e8 , which bars professional players from betting on football-related matters . the offence took place on 20 february . lafferty made one league appearance for norwich last season , and played six times for birmingham city on loan . he was an unused substitute as norwich started their championship season with a 4-1 win over blackburn on saturday . rule e8 prevents professional players not only from betting on matches in which they are involved or have an influence , but also on any other football-related matter anywhere in the world - including matches , the transfer of players , employment of managers , team selection or disciplinary matters .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 诺维奇城队(Norwich City)前锋凯尔·拉弗蒂(Kyle Lafferty)于7月29日被指控违反了英格兰足球协会规则E8，因在与足球相关的事项上进行投注。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 北爱尔兰国脚拉弗蒂于7月29日被指控违反足总规则e8，该规则禁止职业球员在足球相关事项上下注。拉弗蒂在2月20日犯下此罪行。上赛季，他为诺维奇出场一次，在租借至伯明翰城期间出场六次。上周六，拉弗蒂作为替补未登场，目睹诺维奇以4-1击败布莱克本开始英冠赛季。规则e8不仅禁止职业球员在自己参与或有影响的比赛上下注，也禁止他们在世界任何地方对其他足球相关事项下注，包括比赛、球员转会、经理雇用、球队阵容选择或纪律问题。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 北爱尔兰国脚凯尔·拉弗蒂被指控违反足总规则e8，因在2月下注足球相关事项而受到指控。他上赛季只为诺维奇出场一次，租借期间为伯明翰城出场六次。周六，他作为诺维奇首场比赛的替补未上场。

xsum.src: the 38 year old was arrested on friday on suspicion of preventing a lawful burial and perverting the course of justice . the met said the child had not been seen in the 11 years since its disappearance was first reported . a woman , 31 , previously charged in connection with the investigation , appeared in court in july . victoria gayle , 31 , previously of west hendon , north london , was charged after police discovered the remains of another baby at a home in west hendon in june . a post-mortem examination at great ormond street hospital was unable to determine the cause of the child 's death . ms gayle is due to appear in court again in later this month . a 50-year-old woman and a 52-year-old man remain on bail .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 周五，伦敦(London)警方在调查一起婴儿失踪案时以妨碍公务罪逮捕了一名男子。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 一名38岁的女子因涉嫌阻止合法埋葬和妨碍司法公正于周五被逮捕。警方表示，这名孩子在11年前首次被报失后就再也没有被见过。一名31岁的女子在7月份被控与此案有关，并于当月出庭。31岁的维多利亚·盖尔此前居住在伦敦北部的西亨登，警方在6月份在该地发现了另一名婴儿的遗骸。在伦敦大蒙德街医院进行的尸检无法确定这名孩子的死因。盖尔女士将于本月晚些时候再次出庭。一名50岁的女子和一名52岁的男子仍在保释中。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 一名38岁男子因涉嫌阻止合法埋葬和妨碍司法公正被逮捕，儿童失踪11年，另一名婴儿遗骸被发现，无法确定死因。一名女子被起诉，另两人保释。

xsum.src: poet thomas was staying in apartment 205 in the renowned hotel before his death aged 39 on 9 november , 1953 . now developers are about to refurbish the building which will affect the layout of the apartment . geoff haden , who restored the poet 's swansea birthplace , is now appealing for help to stop the work going ahead . mr haden is asking for people to show `` financial and emotional support '' to the apartment 's current tenant artie nash . he said mr nash has been battling against developers refurbishing the building for nearly a decade , but work is now due to start on the entrance to the apartment . mr haden said : `` time is of the essence as the developers of hotel chelsea have told artie that they are blocking up the doorway and tearing up parts of the apartment to make way for a maintenance stairwell . `` not only is artie desperately trying to preserve his own home , but also a small piece of literary heritage which is why we are taking on the campaign on both sides of the atlantic . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 杰夫·哈登(Jeff Harden)正在努力阻止开发商翻新诗人托马斯(Thomas)生前居住的公寓的计划，以保护文学遗产。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 诗人托马斯在1953年11月9日去世，享年39岁。他曾住在著名的酒店205号公寓。现在开发商即将翻新这栋建筑，这将影响公寓的布局。曾修复过诗人斯旺西出生地的杰夫·哈登现在呼吁人们帮助阻止这项工作的进行。哈登先生要求人们给公寓现任租户阿蒂·纳什提供“财务和情感支持”。他说纳什先生已经与开发商抗争近十年，但现在工作即将开始，公寓的入口将被封闭，部分公寓也将被拆除以建造维护楼梯。哈登先生说：“时间紧迫，因为切尔西酒店的开发商告诉阿蒂，他们将封闭入口并拆除公寓的部分，以建造维护楼梯。阿蒂不仅在拼命保护自己的家，也在保护一小片文学遗产，这就是为什么我们在大西洋两岸都发起这项运动的原因。”
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 1953年11月9日，诗人Dylan Thomas在205号公寓去世，现在开发商计划翻新公寓，影响布局。Geoff Haden呼吁帮助保护公寓，Artie Nash与开发商斗争近十年，但翻新仍将进行。保护文学遗产的运动正在进行。

xsum.src: police said the attackers - three white men and one asian man - were racially motivated . protesters have been gathered since 25-year-old jamar clark was shot during a struggle with police on 15 november . people who claimed to witness the incident said that clark was handcuffed , though police dispute this . around two dozen tents and canopy shelters have been erected around the 4th precinct police station . demonstrators have also barricaded the roads with wood and pallets and lit campfires . according to criminal complaints , the four men went to the camp on 23 november . after a group of protesters attempted to escort them away , eight shots were heard . the city 's mayor , betsy hodges , said the camp has become unsafe and has asked people to disband their week-long protest . these request have been rejected by protesters , who have vowed to continue camping out despite cold weather and attacks . one of the shooting victims , wesley martin , said they refuse to leave . `` they can have the street . we can take the sidewalk , '' said martin . `` to be honest , we 're not going nowhere . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 自11月15日枪击事件以来，抗议者一直聚集在警察局周围，尽管天气寒冷且袭击不断，但他们拒绝离开。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 警方表示，袭击者包括三名白人和一名亚裔男子，动机是种族歧视。自从25岁的贾马尔·克拉克在11月15日与警察发生搏斗时被枪杀以来，抗议者一直聚集在一起。目击者称克拉克被手铐锁住，但警方对此表示否认。大约有二十多个帐篷和遮阳棚被搭建在第四警区警察局周围。抗议者还用木材和托盘堵塞道路，并点燃篝火。根据刑事起诉书，四名男子于11月23日前往营地。在一群抗议者试图护送他们离开后，听到了八声枪响。市长贝齐·霍奇斯表示，营地已经变得不安全，并要求人们解散他们持续一周的抗议。但抗议者拒绝了这一要求，他们发誓要继续露营，尽管天气寒冷和遭受袭击。其中一名枪击受害者韦斯利·马丁表示，他们拒绝离开。马丁说：“他们可以占领街道，我们可以走人行道。老实说，我们不会走。”
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 11月15日，警察枪击Jamar Clark引发抗议活动，抗议者露宿在第四警区警察局外，用木材和托盘堵塞道路，点燃篝火。11月23日，四名袭击者开枪袭击抗议者，市长要求解散抗议活动，但遭到拒绝。

xsum.src: satellite images taken on 14 february appear to show two batteries of eight missile launchers and a radar system on woody or yongxing island in the paracels . the presence of missiles would significantly increase tensions in the acrimonious south china sea dispute . china 's foreign minister wang yi said reports were a western media invention . but mr wang defended `` the limited and necessary self-defence facilities '' on islands inhabited by chinese personnel as `` consistent with the right for self-preservation and self-protection ... . under the international law '' . asked about the reports , us secretary of state john kerry attacked china 's increased `` militarisation '' of the contested region , saying it was a `` serious concern '' . taiwan 's defence ministry said it had `` learned of an air defence missile system deployed '' by the chinese on woody island . it would not say how many missiles had been deployed or when , but told the bbc they would be capable of targeting civilian and military aircraft . the commander of the us pacific fleet confirmed the deployment to reuters news agency . adm harry harris said such a move would be `` a militarisation of the south china sea in ways '' china 's president xi jinping had pledged not to make . japan 's chief cabinet secretary yoshihide suga said there were `` serious concerns '' over china 's `` unilateral move to change the status quo '' in the region , and `` we can not accept this fact '' . china has been carrying out extensive land reclamation work in the region , which it says is legal and for civilian purposes . but the work has angered other countries which also claim the territory , and there is growing concern about the implications of the area becoming militarised . the latest images of woody island were captured by imagesat international . they show a close-up of a section of beach , the shape of which resembles the northern coastline as it appears on other images , and point out two missiles batteries . each battery is made up of four launchers and two control vehicles . two of the the launchers appear to have been erected , says the report . an image taken of the site on 3 february shows the beach empty . fox news quoted a us defence official as saying the missiles appeared to be the hq-9 air defence system , with a range of about 200km -lrb- 125 miles -rrb- . china 's deployment of long-range surface-to-air missiles to the south china sea is a clear escalation , but it is not a surprise . nor is it china 's first deployment of advanced military technology to woody island -lrb- yongxing dao -rrb- . last november , photos appeared on the internet of chinese j-11 fighter jets landing on the newly-enlarged runway there . sending the missile batteries now could be a warning to vietnam , or a response to the us navy , which sailed a missile destroyer past woody island at the end of january . so far beijing has been careful not to put any weapons on its newly-constructed islands further south , in the spratly group . that would be much more provocative . last month beijing even sent two civilian airliners to land on its newly-completed runway at fiery cross reef . it was a good publicity stunt . but no one should be in any doubt that the true purpose of those new islands and their new runways is also military . the news comes as south east asian regional leaders end a two-day meeting in california where south china sea had been a topic of debate . us president barack obama said the members had discussed the need for `` tangible steps '' to reduce tensions , including `` a halt to further reclamation , new construction and militarization of disputed areas '' . rival countries have wrangled over territory in the south china sea for centuries , but tension has steadily increased in recent years . its islets and waters are claimed in part or in whole by taiwan , china , vietnam , the philippines , malaysia and brunei . china has backed its expansive claims with island-building and naval patrols , while the us says it opposes restrictions on freedom of navigation and unlawful sovereignty claims - by all sides , but seen by many as aimed at china . the frictions have sparked concern that the area is becoming a flashpoint with global consequences . although largely uninhabited , the paracels and the spratlys may have reserves of natural resources around them . there has been little detailed exploration of the area , so estimates are largely extrapolated from the mineral wealth of neighbouring areas . the sea is also a major shipping route and home to fishing grounds that supply the livelihoods of people across the region .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 西方媒体对中国在南海争议地区部署导弹表示“军事化”，而中方则辩称在中国自己的土地上部署设施是合法的。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 2月14日拍摄的卫星图像显示，西沙群岛的永兴岛上出现了两个八架导弹发射器和一个雷达系统。导弹的存在将大大增加南海争端的紧张局势。中国外交部长王毅表示，这些报道是西方媒体的虚构。但王毅为居住着中国人的岛屿上的“有限和必要的自卫设施”辩护，称其“符合国际法下的自保和自卫权利”。在被问及这些报道时，美国国务卿约翰·克里抨击中国在争议地区的“军事化”，称这是一个“严重的问题”。台湾国防部表示，他们“得知中国在永兴岛部署了防空导弹系统”。他们不愿透露部署了多少枚导弹，也不愿透露何时部署，但告诉BBC这些导弹能够瞄准民用和军用飞机。美国太平洋舰队司令证实了这一部署。哈里·哈里斯上将表示，这样的举动将是“中国总统习近平承诺不会采取的方式下的南海军事化”。日本内阁官房长官菅义伟表示，对中国“单方面改变现状”的“严重关切”，“我们无法接受这一事实”。中国一直在该地区进行大规模的填海造陆工作，称其合法并用于民用目的。但这项工作激怒了其他声称拥有该领土的国家，人们越来越担心该地区军事化的影响。最新的永兴岛图像由Imagesat International拍摄。它们显示了海滩的一个部分的近景，其形状与其他图像上显示的北海岸线相似，并指出了两个导弹发射器。每个发射器由四个发射车和两个控制车组成。报告称，两个发射器似乎已经竖立起来。2月3日拍摄的该地点的图像显示海滩是空的。福克斯新闻援引一名美国国防官员的话说，这些导弹似乎是HQ-9防空系统，射程约为200公里（125英里）。中国向南海部署远程地对空导弹是明显的升级，但并不令人惊讶。这也不是中国首次向永兴岛（永兴岛）部署先进军事技术。去年11月，互联网上出现了中国J-11战斗机降落在新建的跑道上的照片。现在派遣导弹发射器可能是对越南的警告，或者是对美国海军的回应，后者在1月底曾派遣一艘导弹驱逐舰经过永兴岛。到目前为止，北京一直小心翼翼地不在其新建的南部岛屿上放置任何武器，包括南沙群岛。那将更具挑衅性。上个月，北京甚至派遣两架民航客机降落在其新建的火热交叉礁跑道上。这是一个很好的宣传噱头。但是没有人应该怀疑，这些新岛屿和新跑道的真正目的也是军事化。这一消息传出时，东南亚地区领导人结束了在加利福尼亚州的为期两天的会议，南海是其中的一个讨论话题。美国总统巴拉克·奥巴马表示，成员国讨论了需要“切实措施”来减少紧张局势，包括“停止进一步填海造陆、新建和军事化争议地区”。竞争国家几个世纪以来一直在争夺南海领土，但紧张局势近年来不断加剧。它的小岛和水域被台湾、中国、越南、菲律宾、马来西亚和文莱部分或全部声称拥有。中国支持其广阔的主张，通过岛屿建设和海上巡逻来支持，而美国则表示反对限制航行自由和非法主权主张——所有各方都这样认为，但许多人认为这是针对中国的。这些摩擦引发了担心，该地区正在成为一个具有全球影响的火药桶。尽管大部分无人居住，但西沙群岛和南沙群岛周围可能有自然资源储量。该地区的详细勘探很少，因此估计主要是从邻近地区的矿产财富推断出来的。该海域也是一个重要的航运路线，是供养该地区人民生计的渔场所在地。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 中国在西沙群岛的永兴岛部署导弹和雷达系统，引发美国和东南亚国家的担忧。美国批评中国的军事化行动，要求停止填海造陆和军事化。南海领土和资源争端持续加剧，可能对航运路线和地区居民的生计产生影响。

xsum.src: the fire started at south wales wood recycling in heol llan , coity , just before 03:30 bst on monday . firefighters from pencoed and bridgend have isolated the burning material and they will resume work on tuesday . south wales wood recycling said they were working around the clock to help stop the blaze . in a statement the company said the blaze had affected an estimated 1,000-2 ,000 tonnes of recycled wood chip . the cause of the fire is not yet know , but the company said the `` circumstances were suspicious '' . natural resources wales officials are also at the scene in case of any environmental impact .

xsum.src: peter bunyan , 53 , of brooklands road , cosby , pleaded guilty to manslaughter on the grounds of diminished responsibility at derby crown court . the court heard a witness saw him forcing entry into 84-year-old brian robson 's house on 23 february . police then found mr robson with fatal head injuries . bunyan will be sentenced at a later date . police told the court they arrived at the address to find mr robson in the hall and attempts to revive him failed . bunyan had returned to his house next door and was arrested there . det insp chris barratt , from leicestershire police , said : `` bunyan 's actions on that tragic day led to the death of a very much loved family man and devastated a family . `` i would like to offer my condolences to the family and thank them for their co-operation and understanding throughout our investigation and subsequent court proceedings . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 2月23日，53岁的彼得·班扬(Peter Bunyan)闯入布莱恩·罗布森(Brian Robson)的家中并将其杀害，他被指控犯有过失杀人罪。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 彼得·班扬，53岁，住在科斯比布鲁克兰兹路，因在德比郡皇家法院承认精神减退的情况下犯有杀人罪。法院听说，一名目击者看到他在2月23日强行进入84岁的布赖恩·罗布森的房子。警方随后发现罗布森先生头部受伤身亡。班扬将在日后被判刑。警方告诉法院，他们到达现场发现罗布森先生在大厅，试图复苏他失败。班扬回到隔壁的房子被逮捕。来自莱斯特郡警察局的侦探总监克里斯·巴拉特说：“班扬在那个悲惨的日子里的行为导致了一位深受家人喜爱的男子的死亡，给一个家庭带来了巨大的打击。”我想向家人表示慰问，并感谢他们在我们的调查和随后的法庭诉讼中的合作和理解。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 彼得·班扬因减轻责任而认罪，强行进入84岁的布莱恩·罗布森的房子，导致罗布森先生头部受伤身亡。警方在隔壁房子逮捕班扬，他将在以后的日期被判刑。警方向家人表示慰问并感谢他们的合作。

xsum.src: it had lost its mother and become stranded in shallow waters off the coast of mojacar in andalucia . tourists then began touching and photographing the animal rather than seeking help for it . equinac , a local ngo , said `` selfishness '' caused the dolphin `` suffering and stress . '' `` these animals are highly protected ; to disturb them , to harm them , to manipulate them and to harass them is prohibited by law , and we always ask for respect and consideration . ''

xsum.src: tory sources have said mr reckless , the am for south wales east , has held talks with andrew rt davies , leader of the welsh conservatives . an announcement is due on thursday which would see mr reckless join the tory group in cardiff bay . it is understood mr reckless will be an independent am rather than re-join the conservative party . there is resistance to re-admitting mr reckless following his dramatic defection from the conservatives to join ukip in september 2014 . the then-mp fought and won a by-election in his rochester and strood seat in november that year , but lost his seat in the may 2015 general election . he was elected to the assembly in may 2016 as ukip won their first seats in cardiff bay , and he is currently chairman of the climate change , environment and rural affairs committee . he had also worked as a researcher for mp douglas carswell , who left ukip last month . the move would mean the conservative group would become the second-largest , with 12 seats to plaid cymru 's 11 .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 鲁莽先生(Mr Reckless)将退党并成为一名独立议员。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 据保守党消息人士透露，南威尔士东部的议员雷克斯先生已与威尔士保守党领袖安德鲁·RT·戴维斯进行了会谈。据悉，周四将宣布雷克斯先生加入卡迪夫湾的保守党团体，但他将作为独立议员而不是重新加入保守党。由于雷克斯先生在2014年9月从保守党戏剧性地叛逃加入英国独立党，重新接纳他遭到了抵制。当时，他在罗切斯特和斯特鲁德的补选中获胜，但在2015年5月的大选中失去了席位。他于2016年5月当选为议会议员，英国独立党也在卡迪夫湾赢得了首批席位，他目前担任气候变化、环境和农村事务委员会主席。他曾担任议员道格拉斯·卡斯韦尔的研究员，后者于上个月离开了英国独立党。此举意味着保守党团体将成为第二大党，拥有12个席位，而威尔士民族党则有11个席位。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 马克·雷克利斯与威尔士保守党领袖安德鲁·RT·戴维斯谈判，可能重新加入保守党。他曾从保守党叛变加入英国独立党，但在2015年大选中失去席位。此举将使保守党团体成为卡迪夫湾议会的第二大党。

xsum.src: ogogo , 27 , has resumed training as he continues his recovery from a knee operation in early february . `` the physio and the surgeon are both impressed with how quickly he 's got to this point , '' shrewsbury boss paul hurst told bbc radio shropshire . `` if he keeps joining in and he feels good , i 'm not going to rule him out but i 'm not going to rule him in either . '' ogogo suffered medial knee ligament damage against scunthorpe on 11 february but had still played in enough games this season to trigger a contract extension . the former arsenal trainee joined shrewsbury from dagenham & redbridge in june 2015 and has made 79 appearances for the club .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 27岁的足球运动员奥戈戈(Ogogo)已经从膝伤中恢复，并已恢复训练，预计将继续比赛。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 27岁的奥戈戈已经恢复训练，他在2月初接受了膝盖手术。谢菲尔德联队主教练保罗·赫斯特告诉BBC Radio Shropshire说：“物理治疗师和外科医生都对他恢复的速度印象深刻。”虽然奥戈戈在2月11日对阵斯肯索普的比赛中受伤，但他本赛季仍然参加了足够多的比赛，从而触发了合同延期条款。这位前阿森纳青训球员于2015年从达根姆和雷德布里奇加盟谢菲尔德联队，已经为球队出场79次。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 阿布·奥戈戈恢复训练，受伤后仅仅一个月，令理疗师和外科医生印象深刻。他可能会参加Shrewsbury的比赛，这也意味着他的合同将会延长。

xsum.src: the first incident saw a 71-year-old woman from sandyhills tricked by someone claiming to work for bt . now a woman in stranraer has lost money to a caller who said he was contacting her about problems with her internet . he claimed to be from bt technical support and gained remote access to her computer to take the cash . the sandyhills incident happened on 15 september with the stranraer con taking place seven days later . pc siobhan pellett said : `` the ease with which these people seem to be able to gain access to their victim 's computer is frightening and the sums of money being taken are substantial . `` we are asking people to be very , very careful when answering a cold call from someone who tries to gain remote access to their computer in order to rectify an alleged fault . `` our message is worth repeating once again that people should never , never give out any banking details or account numbers over the telephone . `` banks , building societies and reputable businesses never ask for this information . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 9月15日后7天内发生两起电信诈骗案件，受害人蒙受巨大经济损失。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 一篇文章：第一起事件发生在来自桑迪希尔斯的71岁女性被一个自称来自BT的人欺骗。现在，一名来自斯特兰雷的女性也被一个自称与她的互联网有问题的人骗走了钱。他声称自己是BT技术支持人员，并远程访问她的电脑来拿走钱财。桑迪希尔斯的事件发生在9月15日，斯特兰雷的骗局发生在7天后。警官Siobhan Pellett说：“这些人似乎轻而易举地就能够访问受害者的电脑，令人恐惧的是被骗的金额也相当可观。”“我们要求人们在接到陌生人打来的电话，试图远程访问他们的电脑来修复所谓的故障时要非常小心。”“我们要再次重申的信息是，人们绝对不应该在电话中透露任何银行信息或账号。银行、建筑协会和信誉良好的企业从不会要求这些信息。”
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 两名女性分别在9月15日和9月22日被自称来自BT技术支持的人骗取钱财。警方提醒人们不要在电话中透露个人信息。

xsum.src: the department for social development has confirmed that a total of 51 refugees will arrive in belfast from lebanon , under the vulnerable persons relocations scheme . eleven of them are children under the age of five , including a baby . the psni team will also investigate any crimes against the muslim community . the syrian families will be housed in the private rental sector until alternative arrangements are made . this is the first time northern ireland has participated in a refugee resettlement program . muslims and christians are among those due to arrive in mid-december . the first group will be settled in the belfast area . the second group of refugees will arrive in the first quarter of 2016 and will be settled in the north west . prime minister david cameron announced the expansion of the vulnerable persons relocation scheme on 7 september . the scheme will resettle up to 20,000 syrian refugees across the uk over the next five years . refugees from countries neighbouring syria will be resettled under the scheme , mostly turkey , jordan and lebanon . it does not extend to those who seek asylum in europe or countries like libya .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 北爱尔兰(Northern Ireland)将参与难民重新安置计划并收容首批抵达贝尔法斯特(Belfast)的51名难民。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 社会发展部门已确认，共有51名难民将从黎巴嫩抵达贝尔法斯特，参加脆弱人群重新安置计划。其中11人是五岁以下的儿童，包括一名婴儿。警察部队也将调查针对穆斯林社区的任何犯罪行为。叙利亚家庭将被安置在私人租赁部门，直到另有安排。这是北爱尔兰首次参与难民重新安置计划。穆斯林和基督徒都将在12月中旬抵达。第一批难民将安置在贝尔法斯特地区。第二批难民将在2016年第一季度抵达，并在西北部安置。英国首相戴维·卡梅伦于9月7日宣布扩大脆弱人群重新安置计划。该计划将在未来五年内重新安置多达20,000名叙利亚难民在英国各地。来自叙利亚邻国的难民将在该计划下重新安置，主要是土耳其、约旦和黎巴嫩。该计划不包括那些在欧洲或利比亚等国寻求庇护的人。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 北爱尔兰将接收来自黎巴嫩的51名难民，包括11名儿童，将在贝尔法斯特和北爱尔兰西北部安置。PSNI团队将调查针对穆斯林社区的犯罪。英国将在未来五年内安置多达20,000名叙利亚难民，第一批将在12月中旬抵达。

xsum.src: across the uk there were 96,910 residential transactions in june , on a seasonally-adjusted basis . that is a fall of 3.3 % on may 's number , and the lowest total since october 2016 . the figures , from hm revenue and customs -lrb- hmrc -rrb- , represent a small annual rise , up 1 % in comparison with june 2016 . however , last summer 's sales were depressed by the introduction of additional stamp duty rates in april . it is also the first time this year that the number of transactions has fallen below 100,000 a month . property experts think the figures give a more accurate indication of the health of the market than house prices . `` these figures are disappointing as we would have expected them to be much higher bearing in mind the turmoil in the market this time last year following the introduction of the stamp duty surcharge , '' said jeremy leaf , a north london estate agent . where can i afford to live ?
xsum.element-aware_summary: 与上月相比，英国6月份的住宅交易量有所下降，成为自2016年10月以来的最低水平，一些人估计这是印花税(stamp duty )附加费引入造成的市场动荡的结果。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 今年6月，英国共有96,910宗住宅交易，经季节调整后比5月下降了3.3%，也是自2016年10月以来的最低交易量。这些数据来自英国税务和海关总署（HMRC），与2016年6月相比，仅有1%的小幅增长。然而，去年夏天的交易量受到了4月份额外印花税率的影响。这也是今年首次交易量低于每月10万笔的情况。房地产专家认为，这些数据比房价更能准确反映市场的健康状况。北伦敦房地产经纪人杰里米·利夫表示：“这些数据令人失望，考虑到去年同期市场的动荡，我们本来预计交易量会更高。”我能负担得起哪里的房子？
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 英国6月住宅交易量下降，为自2016年10月以来最低。英国税务和海关总署数据显示，与去年同期相比有小幅增长。房价不如交易量反映市场健康状况。房地产专家认为，去年4月额外印花税率的引入是导致交易量下降的原因。

xsum.src: thomas hunter , 58 , of mansfield road , mansfield , was arrested after the crash on the a34 at hinksey hill , oxford , on 25 august . isla wiggin , who was in another car , died in hospital on 27 august . mr hunter has also been charged with causing serious injury to a 31-year-old woman by dangerous driving . he has been released on bail to appear at oxford magistrates ' court on 17 january . a lorry and seven cars were involved in the accident which closed the northbound carriageway for almost 10 hours . a family statement said isla , from fleet in hampshire , was `` a loving and caring '' daughter who `` would have made an amazing big sister '' .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 58岁的托马斯·亨特(Thomas Hunter)被指控于8月25日在牛津(Oxford)辛克西山(Hinksey Hill)a34号公路上撞死了乘坐另一辆车的伊斯拉·威金(Isla Wiggin)。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 58岁的托马斯·亨特在8月25日发生在牛津辛克西山的A34公路上的车祸后被逮捕。在另一辆车上的伊斯拉·威金斯于8月27日在医院去世。亨特先生还被控因危险驾驶导致一名31岁女子受重伤。他已被保释，将于1月17日出庭牛津地方法院。一辆卡车和七辆汽车参与了这起事故，导致北行车道关闭近10个小时。家人发表声明称，来自汉普郡的伊斯拉是“一个充满爱心和关怀”的女儿，她“本可以成为一个了不起的姐姐”。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 牛津一起事故导致伊斯拉·威金死亡，一名31岁女性受重伤。托马斯·亨特因危险驾驶被逮捕和起诉，将于1月17日出庭。事故涉及一辆卡车和七辆汽车，导致北行车道关闭近10小时。伊斯拉被描述为“爱心和关怀”的女儿。

xsum.src: eight people started fighting at the palace theatre in manchester on the opening night of the irish dance show . georgina lynn sixsmith , 48 , has been charged with being drunk and disorderly and assault on a constable , police said . there were no reports of injuries . the theatre has not commented . the trouble began in the orchestra stalls during tuesday 's performance of lord of the dance : dangerous games , directed and choreographed by irish dance superstar flatley . the show is described as a high-energy , two-hour fusion of dance styles - from traditional irish dance to tap and modern - and involves a story of good versus evil , with a hunger games flavour . ms sixsmith , of andrew street , middleton , has been bailed to appear at manchester and salford magistrates ' court on 10 may .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 周二，在剧院举行的《舞蹈：危险游戏》演出中，发生了一起严重斗殴事件，8人被法庭指控。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 在曼彻斯特宫殿剧院的爱尔兰舞蹈秀开幕夜，八人开始打架。警方表示，48岁的乔治娜·林恩·西克斯密斯被指控醉酒滋事和袭击警察。没有人报告受伤。剧院没有发表评论。麻烦始于周二的表演中，由爱尔兰舞蹈巨星弗拉特利执导和编舞的《舞之领主：危险游戏》。这场表演被描述为高能量的两小时舞蹈融合 - 从传统的爱尔兰舞蹈到踢踏舞和现代舞 - 并涉及一个关于善与恶的故事，带有饥饿游戏的风格。来自米德尔顿安德鲁街的西克斯密斯被保释，将于5月10日出庭曼彻斯特和索尔福德地方法院。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 曼彻斯特宫殿剧院爱尔兰舞蹈表演开幕之夜，八人发生斗殴，乔治娜·林恩·西克斯密斯被指控醉酒和殴打警察。表演由舞蹈之王迈克尔·弗拉特利执导，涉及善恶对抗的故事。乔治娜被保释，将于5月10日出庭。剧院未发表评论。

xsum.src: the national lottery windfall has been won with a ticket bought somewhere in denbighshire for the 1 april draw . it matched the lotto millionaire raffle draw - aqua 6323 7030 - but no-one has come forward . the mystery ticket holder has until the end of september to submit their claim - otherwise the money will go to lottery good causes . `` we 're urging everyone who bought a lotto ticket in this area to check their old tickets again or look anywhere a missing ticket could be hiding , '' said andy carter from the national lottery . `` try checking in the pockets of clothing , in wallets , bags and down the back of the sofa - someone out there could literally be sitting on a fortune . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 国家彩票(National Lottery)正在寻找4月1日购买的彩票的中奖者，巨额奖金目前无人领取。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 4月1日的国家彩票大奖已经被一张在登比郡购买的彩票中奖，与百万彩票抽奖匹配的号码是aqua 6323 7030，但是没有人站出来认领。神秘的彩票持有人有到9月底提交申请的时间，否则这笔钱将捐给彩票慈善事业。国家彩票的安迪·卡特表示：“我们敦促在这个地区购买彩票的每个人再次检查他们的旧彩票，或者在任何可能藏有遗失彩票的地方寻找，比如衣服口袋、钱包、包包和沙发后面 - 有人可能就坐在一笔财富上。”
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 国家彩票风潮被赢得，登比郡某处购买的彩票匹配百万富翁抽奖，但持有人尚未出现。敦促人们检查彩票，资金可能流向彩票公益事业。持有人需在9月底前认领，否则资金将流向公益事业。

xsum.src: thomas orchard , 32 , died in october 2012 after being arrested in exeter . but bristol crown court heard custody sergeant jan kingshott , 44 , `` did his best '' despite the outcome . mr kingshott and civilian detention officers simon tansley , 38 , and michael marsden , 55 , all deny manslaughter . patrick gibbs , for the defence , said : `` what mr kingshott did was straightforward and professional and , in almost every respect , standard procedure . `` you will not find any anger , any sudden movement or over-reaction at mr orchard 's behaviour , or any brutality . `` what you will find is force . we need to be straight with ourselves about the practical realities of force . '' mr gibbs described mr orchard - who had schizophrenia - as `` angry and aggressive '' when he arrived at the custody centre . mr gibbs said : `` it was not mr orchard 's fault that he was behaving the way he was behaving . mr orchard was not at fault but it does n't mean force was unnecessary . `` it was not obviously unnecessary to look to the equipment which they had been given and had been trained to use . '' church caretaker mr orchard was handcuffed , held down and had an emergency response belt put across his face to restrain him , the court previously heard . mr gibbs said : `` mr kingshott does not pretend that everything was perfect or there is nothing that could have been improved . `` but he is not a computer . what he did not know was how this would turn out . '' he told the court mr kingshott `` did his best '' and `` he was a good custody sergeant , a decent person and a good witness '' . mr orchard was pronounced dead seven days after the incident in hospital .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 32岁的托马斯·奥查德(Thomas Orchard)2012年10月在埃克塞特(Exeter)被捕后死于拘留所，看守人员面临过失杀人罪指控。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 2012年10月，32岁的托马斯·奥查德在被捕后死于埃克塞特。但是布里斯托尔刑事法庭听到，44岁的拘留警官詹·金斯霍特“尽力了”，尽管结果不尽如人意。金斯霍特先生和平民拘留官西蒙·坦斯利，38岁，和迈克尔·马斯登，55岁，都否认杀人罪。辩护律师帕特里克·吉布斯说：“金斯霍特先生所做的是简单而专业的，几乎在每个方面都是标准程序。”他还说：“你不会发现任何愤怒，任何突然的动作或过度反应，也没有任何残酷行为。”吉布斯先生将患有精神分裂症的奥查德先生描述为“愤怒和挑衅”的状态。他说：“奥查德先生的行为并不是他的错。奥查德先生并不是错的，但这并不意味着使用武力是不必要的。”他还告诉法庭，金斯霍特先生“尽力了”，“他是一位优秀的拘留警官，一个善良的人，也是一个好的证人”。奥查德先生在被捕后七天在医院被宣布死亡。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 2012年10月，托马斯·奥查德在被逮捕后死亡，三名被告被指控过度使用武力。辩护律师表示，警方尽力而为，但奥查德的精神病导致他的行为。审判仍在进行中。

xsum.src: the museum closed last october to allow work to upgrade the building and provide more display space . about half of the project 's # 66m cost is being funded by the council . in april 2015 , the council provided # 5.7 m to kick-start the building 's revamp , which houses treasures donated to the city by collector sir william burrell in 1944 . the burrell collection consists of more than 8,000 artefacts but fewer than a fifth of them have been on show at any one time . when it re-opens to visitors in 2020 , the basement of the building will become part of the exhibition space , so that 90 % of the objects can be viewed by the public . the heritage lottery fund has given # 15m to the project and the uk government has also contributed # 5m . it is hoped a fundraising campaign will raise the rest . cllr archie graham said : `` sir william 's great legacy has been described as the greatest gift a city has ever received and we have a moral duty to ensure it is housed in the finest of buildings . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 去年10月，巴勒珍藏馆(Burrell Collection)关闭进行升级，以容纳更大的展示藏品，预计将于2020年重新开放。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 这篇文章介绍了格拉斯哥博物馆的升级工程，该博物馆于去年十月关闭，以提供更多的展示空间。该项目的大约一半费用由市政府资助。2015年4月，市政府提供了570万英镑来启动建筑的改造，这座建筑收藏了1944年由收藏家威廉·伯雷尔爵士捐赠给城市的珍宝。伯雷尔收藏品包括8000多件文物，但每次只有不到五分之一的展品可以展出。2020年重新向公众开放时，建筑的地下室将成为展览空间的一部分，这样90%的文物都可以被公众观赏。遗产彩票基金提供了1500万英镑的资助，英国政府也捐赠了500万英镑。希望通过筹款活动筹集剩余的资金。市议员阿奇·格雷厄姆表示：“伯雷尔爵士的伟大遗产被称为城市所收到的最伟大的礼物，我们有道义责任确保它被收藏在最好的建筑中。”
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 格拉斯哥市议会为巴雷尔收藏提供#66m资金，博物馆关闭进行建筑升级和扩建，2020年重新向公众开放。遗产彩票基金和英国政府提供资金，筹款活动。90％的收藏品将可供公众观看。

xsum.src: gwen thomson , 51 , from torry , died after the accident on market street on wednesday morning . insp jon barron said : `` our thoughts are very much with gwen 's family , friends and work colleagues at this very sad time . '' the 60-year-old male lorry driver was uninjured . police scotland thanked those who helped at the scene . insp barron added : `` we have spoken to a number of witnesses to the incident already . however , i would urge anyone who has n't yet been in contact with us to do so in order to help piece together exactly what happened . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 周三上午，51岁的格温·汤姆森(Gwen Thomson)在市场街上被一辆卡车撞死，警方正在调查此案。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 51岁的Gwen Thomson在周三早上在市场街发生事故后去世。警察局长Jon Barron表示：“我们非常想念Gwen的家人、朋友和同事们，这是一个非常悲伤的时刻。”60岁的男性卡车司机没有受伤。苏格兰警方感谢在现场帮助的人。Barron局长补充道：“我们已经与事故目击者进行了谈话。然而，我敦促尚未与我们联系的人尽快这样做，以帮助我们了解事故的详细情况。”
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 苏格兰警方表示，51岁的格温·汤姆森在星期三早上发生的市场街事故中遇难。警方呼吁目击者提供线索，调查仍在进行中。事故中60岁的卡车司机未受伤。警方向在现场提供帮助的人表示感谢。

xsum.src: grace taylor , who was backpacking , had been uncontactable since 16 february , her mother sam taylor said on facebook . the family filed a missing person report to dorset police on 21 february . then on 22 february , ms taylor contacted her family , who booked her a flight home , although her mother said she did not board the flight . sam taylor said her daughter had called from ao nang in krabi province . mrs taylor said grace taylor was `` very stressed and frightened saying that people were trying to hurt her and were following her and she wanted to come home '' . she added that `` all previous backpacker sightings have reported that she is disorientated and not in a good mental state '' . she appealed to the backpacker community to help locate her daughter . a member of the family is flying to thailand to search for ms taylor and bring her home , she said .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 格雷斯·泰勒(Grace Taylor)2月16日在泰国(thailand)失踪，她的母亲已向警方报案，并在网上发布求助信息。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 格蕾丝·泰勒是一名背包客，自2月16日起失去联系，她的母亲萨姆·泰勒在Facebook上表示。家人于2月21日向多塞特郡警方报告了她的失踪。然后在2月22日，泰勒女士联系了她的家人，家人为她预订了一张回家的机票，但她的母亲表示她没有登上飞机。萨姆·泰勒说，她的女儿从克拉比省的奥南来电。泰勒夫人说，格蕾丝·泰勒“非常紧张和害怕，说有人想伤害她，跟踪她，她想回家”。她补充说，“所有之前见过她的背包客都报告说她迷失方向，精神状态不佳”。她呼吁背包客社区帮助寻找她的女儿。家人中的一位成员将飞往泰国寻找泰勒女士并将她带回家，她说。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 英国背包客格雷斯·泰勒在泰国旅行后失踪，家人报告失踪并呼吁背包客社区帮助寻找。她在奥南联系家人，但未登上回家航班。家人正在泰国寻找她。

xsum.src: lancashire county council has earmarked land on the former glenburn sports college and skelmersdale college . the sports college closed in august , while skelmersdale college 's westbank campus , owned by newcastle college , is also unused . the decision follows a comparative study by network rail of both sites and one near the concourse shopping centre . skelmersdale 's original railway station closed to passengers in 1956 . the council - which owns glenburn sports college - said skelmersdale could get two direct trains to liverpool per hour under the plans it has made in partnership with merseytravel and west lancashire borough council . county councillor john fillis , cabinet member for highways and transport , said it was an `` exciting step forward '' . he said the preferred location was big enough to allow for the possibility of future expansion . he added : `` it has good highway access and good connectivity to the town and the surrounding area . '' the authority confirmed it will now start the process of acquiring the relevant land . skelmersdale was designated a new town on 9 october 1961 . it is one of the largest towns in the north west of england not to have its own railway station .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 兰开夏郡议会(Lancashire County Council)在研究现场后决定为斯凯尔默斯代尔(Skelmersdale)开设一个新的城镇火车站。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 兰开夏郡议会已经确定了前格伦伯恩体育学院和斯凯尔默斯代尔学院的用地。体育学院于8月关闭，而斯凯尔默斯代尔学院的西岸校区，由纽卡斯尔学院拥有，也未被使用。这一决定是在网络铁路对比研究了两个地点和Concourse购物中心附近的一个地点后做出的。斯凯尔默斯代尔的原火车站于1956年关闭。议会表示，根据与默西旅游和西兰开夏自治市议会合作的计划，斯凯尔默斯代尔将每小时可获得两班直达利物浦的火车。兰开夏郡议会的公路和交通部门负责人约翰·菲利斯表示，这是一个“令人兴奋的进展”。他说，首选地点足够大，可以为未来的扩张留出空间。他补充说：“它有良好的公路通达性，与城镇和周边地区有良好的连接。”该机构确认将开始收购相关土地的程序。斯凯尔默斯代尔于1961年10月9日被指定为新城镇。它是英格兰北部最大的没有自己火车站的城镇之一。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 兰开夏郡议会决定在斯凯尔默斯代尔建立新火车站，以取代已关闭的格伦伯恩体育学院和斯凯尔默斯代尔学院的西岸校区。该决定是与默西旅游局和西兰开夏自治市政厅合作做出的，新火车站将每小时提供两班直达利物浦的火车。

xsum.src: a row erupted after council proposals for new contracts for more than 2,000 staff that would result in wage cuts of up to 23 % . the authority fears it could face equal pay claims from other employees if it does not make the cuts . hundreds attended a rally to `` celebrate the work of durham 's teaching assistants '' . claire williams , northern regional secretary of unison said : `` there is positive progress being made ... we are really keen to get a resolution to this dispute quickly for our teaching assistants as it 's been a very stressful year for them . '' the new contracts were originally proposed for january but after industrial action in november the plan was suspended . members of the unison and atl unions were due to strike again for three days in december but that was called off to restart talks . the council says its review of the matter should be completed in september .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 数百人参加了罢工，抗议委员会提出的削减员工工资的新合同，该合同已因罢工而暂停。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 一场争议爆发，原因是市议会提出了针对2000多名员工的新合同，将导致工资下降高达23%。该机构担心如果不进行削减，可能会面临其他员工提出的同工同酬索赔。数百人参加了一场集会，以“庆祝达勒姆教学助理的工作”。联合会北部地区秘书克莱尔·威廉姆斯表示：“我们正在取得积极进展……我们非常希望能够尽快解决这场争议，为我们的教学助理减轻压力，因为他们经历了非常艰难的一年。”新合同最初计划于1月生效，但在11月的工业行动后，计划被暂停。联合会和ATL工会的成员原定于12月再次罢工三天，但这一计划被取消以重新开始谈判。市议会表示，他们对此事的审查应该会在9月完成。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 杜伦委员会提议新合同导致教学助理工资削减，引发工会抗议。工会要求快速解决，委员会担心面临平等工资索赔。工会和教师联盟罢工，谈判重新开始，审查将在九月完成。

xsum.src: steven rodriguez , who was better known as a$ ap yams or yamborghini , died aged 26 on 18 january at brooklyn 's woodhull medical centre . he founded the us rap collective a$ ap mob along with fellow new yorkers a$ ap bari and a$ ap illz . now the new york times reports that his death was caused by acute mixed drug intoxication . opiates and benzodiazepines were found in his system and it was ruled an accident . after his death artists paid tribute to him on social media . drake tweeted : `` rest in peace yams . a$ ap is family . '' azealia banks wrote : `` asap yams should be remembered as a leader , an innovator and most importantly as an important part of nyc youth culture . '' follow @bbcnewsbeat on twitter , bbcnewsbeat on instagram and radio1newsbeat on youtube
xsum.element-aware_summary: 美国说唱乐队A$ap Yams创始人史蒂文·罗德里格斯(STEVEN RODRIGUEZ)于1月18日因药物中毒去世，享年26岁。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 美国说唱歌手史蒂文·罗德里格斯，艺名A$AP Yams或Yamborghini，于1月18日在布鲁克林的伍德赫尔医疗中心去世，享年26岁。他与纽约的A$AP Bari和A$AP Illz一起创立了美国说唱集体A$AP Mob。据《纽约时报》报道，他的死因是急性混合药物中毒，尸检发现他体内有鸦片类和苯二氮平类药物，被认定为意外死亡。在他去世后，许多艺术家在社交媒体上向他致敬。德雷克发推文说：“安息吧，Yams。A$AP就是一家人。”艾泽莉娅·班克斯写道：“A$AP Yams应该被铭记为一位领袖、创新者，更重要的是纽约青年文化的重要一部分。”关注推特上的@BBCNewsbeat，Instagram上的BBCNewsbeat和YouTube上的Radio1Newsbeat。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 26岁的史蒂文·罗德里格斯（艺名A$AP Yams）于1月18日在纽约去世，死因为急性混合药物中毒。他是A$AP Mob的创始人之一，艺术家们在社交媒体上纷纷悼念他。他被认为是纽约青年文化的重要领袖和创新者。

xsum.src: for almost 60 years tom bravin dressed up as father christmas to distribute presents to over 4,500 underprivileged children around the city . the former raf communications worker shunned praise and kept his identity a secret , calling himself mr x. friends and family have vowed to carry on mr bravin 's work in his memory . when the strain of personally delivering so many gifts became too much for him , mr bravin recruited `` santa 's little helpers '' , who in turn were sworn to secrecy . mr bravin 's son terry said : `` what a legacy he 's left us - i am really proud of him . `` we have got a team of people to make sure his appeal is still going . '' neighbour kat thomas added : `` what a kind heart . he brought so much joy to so many children and i will continue to support this cause as long as it is running . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 近60年来，汤姆·布拉文(Tom Bravin)一直打扮成圣诞老人，为贫困儿童分发礼物，受到家人和邻居的一致好评。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 近60年来，汤姆·布拉文一直扮演圣诞老人，为全城超过4,500名贫困儿童分发礼物。这位前英国皇家空军通信员拒绝赞扬，保持身份的秘密，自称为“X先生”。朋友和家人发誓要继续布拉文先生的工作，以纪念他。当亲自送出这么多礼物的压力变得太大时，布拉文先生招募了“圣诞老人的小助手”，他们也被要求保密。布拉文先生的儿子特里说：“他留给我们的遗产真是太伟大了，我为他感到骄傲。”邻居凯特·托马斯补充道：“他的心地多么善良。他给那么多孩子带来了欢乐，我会继续支持这个事业，只要它还在运行。”
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 汤姆·布拉文先生60年来扮演圣诞老人为4,500名贫困儿童分发礼物，他的去世后，家人和朋友发誓继续他的工作。布拉文先生通过招募圣诞老人的小助手，带给孩子们快乐，留下了一份珍贵的遗产。

xsum.src: shazia ahmad and wasim ali , from newport , umar arif , umar butt and khalid yassen , from cardiff , and zawed malik from greater manchester , all deny conspiracy to supply the class a drug . cardiff crown court heard two cars were followed by undercover police officers . almost 40kg -lrb- 88lbs -rrb- of heroin worth about # 5m was seized between 2013 and 2014 . the jury was told the speaker was being carried in a car that was stopped by police . mr butt and mr yassen were arrested on the m5 with 36.5 kg of heroin in a speaker and suitcase in their citroen picasso . undercover officers said they followed the picasso and a fiat punto `` travelling in convoy '' but admitted under cross examination that they did not see a `` speaker box '' being placed in the picasso . the court heard money was handed over at locations across newport , including a lidl car park .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 13-14年，六名毒贩被抓获，携带近40公斤海洛因，他们将这些海洛因存放在汽车的扬声器和手提箱中。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 来自新港的沙齐亚·艾哈迈德和瓦西姆·阿里，来自加的夫的乌马尔·阿里夫，乌马尔·巴特和哈利德·亚森，以及来自大曼彻斯特的扎维德·马利克，都否认了阴谋供应A类毒品。加的夫刑事法庭听说，两辆汽车被卧底警察跟踪。在2013年和2014年之间，共有近40公斤（88磅）价值约500万英镑的海洛因被查获。陪审团被告知，扬声器被装在一辆被警察拦截的汽车中。巴特先生和亚森先生在他们的雪铁龙毕加索车上被捕，车上有36.5公斤的海洛因和一个手提箱。卧底警察说，他们跟踪了毕加索和菲亚特普通车“一起行驶”，但在交叉审问中承认他们没有看到“扬声器箱”被放在毕加索车里。法庭听说，钱是在新港各处交付的，包括利德尔停车场。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 六名被告因阴谋供应价值约500万英镑的海洛因被逮捕和审判。卧底警察跟踪两辆汽车，查获40公斤海洛因。钱在新港各地交付。被告否认指控。审判进行中。

xsum.src: tommy roome , of rams grove , romford , has been accused of murdering mr hayden , 27 , who was stabbed outside his home in chadwell heath on 13 september . mr roome was also charged with the attempted murder of mr hayden 's father , paul , 46 , who was also injured . he is due to appear at barkingside magistrates ' court on friday . mr hayden died from a stab wound to the thigh a day after he was attacked in gibbfield close at about 01:25 bst . both he and his father were assaulted when they confronted a group of men outside their home following the attempted theft of a moped . the bodyguard had worked in security at itv and at high-profile events including the marriage between footballer peter crouch and model abbey clancy . he was also employed by havering council . two other teenagers , aged 16 and 19 , were previously arrested over the attack and bailed .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 27岁的海登先生(mr hayden)于9月13日被汤米·鲁姆(Tommy Roome)刺死，汤米·鲁姆被指控犯有谋杀罪，将于周五出庭。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 罗姆福德的拉姆斯格罗夫的汤米·鲁姆被指控谋杀27岁的海登先生，后者于9月13日在查德韦尔希斯被刺死。罗姆还被控企图谋杀海登先生的父亲保罗，46岁，后者也受伤。他将于周五出庭出席巴金赛德地方法院。海登先生在被攻击后的第二天因大腿刺伤而死亡，当时他和父亲在家外遭遇了一群男子，这是因为他们试图偷一辆摩托车。这位保镖曾在ITV和高调活动中担任安全工作，包括足球运动员彼得·克劳奇和模特艾比·克兰西的婚礼。他还受雇于哈弗林姆市议会。此前，还有两名16岁和19岁的青少年因此次袭击被逮捕并获得保释。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 海登先生被谋杀，保罗·海登被刺伤，汤米·鲁姆被指控。海登父子在家门口遭遇袭击，海登先生死于刺伤。两名十几岁的青少年被逮捕和保释。汤米·鲁姆曾在ITV和高调活动中担任保镖。案件将于9月13日在巴金赛德地方法院审理。

xsum.src: the crash happened outside castle bytham , south of grantham , on wednesday afternoon . the 73-year-old pilot , from thurnby , leicestershire , is being treated for back and leg injuries . a 52-year-old tanker driver was treated for minor injuries and the 61-year-old occupant of the property was unhurt . the air accidents investigation branch -lrb- aaib -rrb- has said it is aware of the incident and is making inquiries . lincolnshire fire and rescue said the man who lives in the bungalow was in the garden and pushed the tanker driver out of the way , to prevent them both being hit . the pilot became stuck in the plane , which was embedded in the building , and the aircraft 's landing gear broke off and landed on a bed . a police guard remains in place at the bungalow while recovery work is carried out . pete wiles , from the fire service , said : `` if they had n't moved ... they would have been hit . `` it 's a fairly miraculous escape ... there 's an overhead power line nearby which it missed as well . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 周三下午，一架飞机撞上了比舍姆(Bisham)城堡外的一座平房，造成飞行员和一名油罐车司机受伤，而房主幸运地没有受伤。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 周三下午，一架飞机在格兰瑟姆南部的比瑟姆城堡外坠毁。73岁的飞行员来自莱斯特郡的瑟恩比，正在接受背部和腿部的治疗。一名52岁的油罐车司机受了轻伤，而61岁的房屋居民则没有受伤。空中事故调查局已经表示，他们已经意识到这起事故，并正在进行调查。林肯郡消防和救援部门表示，住在平房里的男子当时在花园里，把油罐车司机推开，以防止两人被撞。飞行员被困在嵌入建筑物中的飞机里，飞机的起落架断裂并落在一张床上。警方仍在平房附近驻守，等待恢复工作进行。消防部门的皮特·怀尔斯表示：“如果他们没有移动……他们就会被撞到。这是一个相当奇迹般的逃生……附近还有一条高压电线，它也没有被撞到。”
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 一架飞机在英国格兰瑟姆南部城堡比瑟姆外坠毁，飞行员和油罐车司机受伤，但幸运的是房屋居民避免了被撞击。空中事故调查局正在调查，警方正在现场警戒。

xsum.src: the bodies were found on sunday , but no identities have been released . two people have been reported missing from a sushi restaurant hit by the blast : nicholas figueroa , who was on a date there , and a worker , moises lucon . a further 22 people were injured in the explosion and subsequent fire , four critically . utility inspectors had declared plumbing and gas work inside one of the buildings faulty just an hour before the explosion , locking the line to ensure it would not be used and then leaving , officials said . the blast that followed soon after left heaps of bricks and mangled debris across the street in manhattan 's east village . mr figueroa 's date , who is being treated in hospital , remembers only stumbling out of the restaurant before losing consciousness . new york mayor bill de blasio said officials would investigate whether anyone had improperly tapped the gas supply prior to the blast .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 曼哈顿(Manhattan)东村一家寿司店发生爆炸，造成两人死亡、22人受伤。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 周日发现了两具尸体，但身份尚未公布。据报道，有两人在被爆炸冲击的寿司店失踪：尼古拉斯·菲格罗亚和工人莫伊塞斯·卢孔。爆炸和随后的火灾造成22人受伤，其中4人情况危急。官员表示，事发前一个小时，公用事业检查员已经宣布其中一栋建筑物的水管和燃气工作存在问题，随后锁定了管道以防止使用，然后离开。随后发生的爆炸在曼哈顿东村街道上留下了一堆砖块和破碎的残骸。菲格罗亚的约会对象正在医院接受治疗，他只记得在餐厅里跌倒后失去了意识。纽约市长比尔·德布拉西奥表示，官员将调查是否有人在爆炸前非法接入燃气供应。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 纽约东村一家寿司店发生爆炸和火灾，导致两人失踪，22人受伤，其中4人重伤。爆炸前一小时，公用事业检查员宣布水暖和煤气工作有问题。调查人员发现两具尸体，身份尚未公布。调查人员将调查是否有人在爆炸前非法接入煤气供应。

xsum.src: allan stanley , 76 , of nefyn , was snorkelling around the island of gozo when he was hit on 19 june . his widow diane told the inquest in caernarfon it happened in seconds . she said : `` there was n't enough time for me to shout or do anything . '' a conclusion of accidental death was recorded by coroner dewi pritchard-jones . the inquest heard mr stanley was snorkelling in a bay when a rigid inflatable boat started up . `` a person snorkelling is very difficult to see , '' mr pritchard-jones said . `` at best it 's only part of the top of the head that can be seen . `` whether the person operating the boat looked or made any efforts to see if anyone was in the water , i ca n't say . '' pathologist dr mark lord told the inquest mr stanley suffered head injuries and his death was `` likely to have been virtually instantaneous '' .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 6月19日，艾伦·斯坦利(Alan Stanley)在戈佐岛(Gozo)浮潜时被一艘充气船撞死。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 76岁的艾伦·斯坦利在6月19日在戈佐岛附近潜水时被撞，他的遗孀黛安妮告诉卡纳芬农的调查，这发生在几秒钟内。她说：“我没有足够的时间大喊或做任何事情。”法医德维·普里查德-琼斯裁定为意外死亡。调查听到斯坦利先生在一个海湾潜水时，一艘刚性充气船启动。“一个潜水者很难被看到，”普里查德-琼斯先生说。“最多只能看到头部的一部分。”“无论操作船只的人是否看过或做过任何努力来看看水中是否有人，我无法说。”病理学家马克·洛德告诉调查，斯坦利先生遭受头部伤势，死亡“可能是几乎瞬间发生的”。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 艾伦·斯坦利在戈佐岛附近潜水时被一艘刚刚启动的刚性充气艇撞击，导致他死亡。法医杜威·普里查德-琼斯记录了一起意外死亡的结论。

xsum.src: the 27-year-old judo athlete from inverness was placed in an induced coma after suffering head injuries in the motorbike taxi accident on 10 may . since being flown to a hospital in thailand , doctors have begun the process of waking her from the coma . on sunday , she opened her left eye and followed a light shown into it . her family joked in a facebook post that ms inglis opened her eye in shock at hearing her father , robert , singing by her bedside . in the same message , her family added that her temperature was falling and had almost returned to normal , an indication that she was fighting infections , including pneumonia . ms inglis had been in vietnam for four months teaching english to underprivileged children when the accident happened . it is understood that a long skirt she was wearing , and which she had tied up for the bike journey , became unravelled and caught in the wheel of the motorbike , pulling her off the machine and on to the road .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 27岁的柔道运动员英格利斯(inglis)在5月10日的事故中受伤并失去知觉，目前正在泰国(Thailand)一家医院接受治疗并苏醒。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 这篇文章讲述了来自苏格兰因弗内斯的27岁柔道运动员在5月10日乘坐摩托车出车祸后，被送往泰国医院接受治疗并被置于人工昏迷状态。经过医生的努力，她已经开始从昏迷中苏醒。周日，她睁开了左眼并能够跟随光线。她的家人在Facebook上开玩笑说，英格丽斯听到父亲罗伯特在床边唱歌时，惊讶地睁开了眼睛。在同一条信息中，她的家人补充说，她的体温正在下降，几乎恢复正常，这表明她正在与感染作斗争，包括肺炎。据了解，英格丽斯在越南教授贫困儿童英语已经四个月，事故发生时她穿着一条长裙，为了乘坐摩托车而把裙子系起来，但裙子松开后被卷入摩托车轮中，将她拉下车并摔倒在地。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 英国女子斯蒂芬妮·英格利斯在越南遭遇摩托车事故，被送往泰国医院，进入人工昏迷状态。经过医生的治疗，她已开始苏醒，睁开左眼并跟随光线。她的家人表示，她的体温已经恢复正常，正在与感染作斗争。事故发生时，她正在越南教贫困儿童英语。

xsum.src: police said the attackers entered the property on craigmillar castle road at about 20:15 on friday . police believe the attack may have been targeted . a 38-year-old man suffered serious , but non-life threatening , facial injuries and was taken to hospital for treatment . the second victim , aged 49 , did not need medical attention . of police scotland , said : `` we believe this may have been a targeted attack and are working to establish the full circumstances . `` i 'd urge anyone who may have seen suspicious behaviour by three men in the area at this time to come forward . `` we 're also eager to trace any suspicious vehicles seen in the street around this time , and i 'd again ask anyone who may have information about this get in touch . ''

xsum.gpt3_summary: 周五晚上20:15左右，袭击者进入了位于克雷格米勒城堡路的房产。警方认为这次袭击可能是有针对性的。一名38岁男子受到了严重但非生命威胁的面部伤势，被送往医院接受治疗。第二名受害者，49岁，不需要医疗救治。苏格兰警方的一位发言人表示：“我们认为这可能是一次有针对性的袭击，正在努力确定完整的情况。”“我呼吁任何在这个时间段内看到三名男子有可疑行为的人士提供线索。”“我们也希望追踪到在这个时间段内在街道上出现的可疑车辆，我再次请求任何有关此事的信息的人士与我们联系。”

xsum.src: the emergency services were called to the property in the sangomore area of durness at about 02:00 . police scotland said it was not known if she was in the house at the time . her relatives have been informed . det insp richard baird said the fire was not thought to be suspicious , but the damage caused had prevented entry to the property . he said : `` a joint investigation with the fire service will be carried out . `` enquiries are at a very early stage , however , initial enquiries would suggest there are no suspicious circumstances . `` due to the extensive structural damage and uncertainty of the building , gaining access to the property will take some considerable time . `` structural engineers will advise when it will be safe to enter the property . ''

xsum.gpt3_summary: 凌晨2点左右，紧急服务部门接到报警称在邓内斯的桑格莫尔地区的一处房屋发生火灾。苏格兰警方表示目前不清楚当时是否有人在屋内。受害人的亲属已经得到通知。调查人员表示火灾并非可疑，但是造成的损坏导致无法进入房屋。警方将与消防部门展开联合调查。目前还没有发现可疑情况。由于房屋结构严重受损，进入房屋需要一定时间。结构工程师将会提供安全进入房屋的建议。

xsum.src: police said that at least eight carriages jumped the tracks near muzaffarnagar , about 130km -lrb- 80 miles -rrb- north of the capital delhi . the cause of the crash , which happened on saturday evening , is not yet clear . rescuers worked into the night to find survivors . tv footage showed carriages piled on top of one another . the train had been travelling to the hindu holy city of haridwar , in the foothills of the himalayas , from puri , in eastern odisha state . `` we are struggling to pull out the injured and are waiting for gas cutters to arrive , '' said police officer ajay pandey at the scene . `` it 's too dark to launch a fully fledged search operation but our teams are trying their best . '' indian prime minister narendra modi tweeted his condolences to families of the victims and pledged all possible assistance . train accidents are fairly common in india . the railway system carries more than 22 million passengers a day and much of the equipment is out of date . an accident in uttar pradesh last november killed 150 people and another in the same state a year before killed 39 .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 周六晚，一列火车在印度(Indian)首都德里(Delhi)以北约130公里处脱轨，事故原因仍在调查中。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 周六晚上，印度北部距首都德里约130公里的穆扎法尔纳加尔附近发生了一起火车脱轨事故，至少有8节车厢脱轨。事故原因尚不清楚，救援人员在夜间继续搜寻幸存者。电视画面显示车厢堆叠在一起。这列火车从东部奥里萨邦的普里开往喜马拉雅山脚下的印度教圣城哈里杜瓦尔。警官阿贾伊·潘迪在现场表示：“我们正在努力救出伤者，等待气割机到达。”印度总理纳伦德拉·莫迪在推特上向遇难者家属表示哀悼，并承诺提供一切可能的帮助。印度的火车事故相当普遍，每天运送超过2200万乘客，许多设备已经过时。去年11月，北方邦发生的一起事故造成150人死亡，一年前同一邦的另一起事故造成39人死亡。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 周六晚上，印度北方邦穆扎法尔纳加尔发生火车脱轨事故，造成至少8节车厢脱轨，伤亡情况不明。印度总理莫迪发推文表达哀悼并提供援助。印度铁路系统每天运送超过2200万乘客，事故频发。救援和搜救行动仍在进行中。

xsum.src: the 56-year-old man , from essex , was pronounced dead at the scene of the crash in a field off burrows lane , in the middle stoke area , on sunday . his next of kin have been informed . no-one else was in the aircraft . the air accidents investigation branch -lrb- aaib -rrb- attended and are investigating the cause of the crash , which happened at about 16:18 gmt . louise holloway , who lives nearby , was outside in the garden when she heard a `` huge bang '' and saw `` a massive orange flash right across the sky '' . `` one man ran across the field but there was no way the pilot could have got out . it 's really sad , '' she said . representatives from uk power networks and fire crews also attended .

xsum.gpt3_summary: 一名56岁的男子在周日在埃塞克斯郡的中斯托克地区的一个农田发生的坠机事故中丧生。他的亲属已经被通知。没有其他人在飞机上。英国空中事故调查局（AAIB）出席并正在调查事故原因，事故发生于格林尼治标准时间下午4:18左右。附近居民路易丝·霍洛威（Louise Holloway）在花园里听到“巨大的爆炸声”，看到“整个天空都是橙色的闪光”。她说：“有一个人跑过田野，但飞行员无法逃生。这真的很悲哀。”英国电力网络和消防队的代表也出席了现场。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 一架飞机在米德尔斯托克地区坠毁，一名56岁男子丧生。空中事故调查局正在调查事故原因。目击者听到巨大的爆炸声，看到天空中有一道巨大的橙色闪光。紧急服务人员赶到现场。

xsum.src: the man had originally been charged with causing grievous bodily harm to paul colin morrison , 51 , from burton leonard , harrogate , on 1 november . mr morrison died at harrogate district hospital on 20 november . a 44-year-old man , from harrogate , is expected to appear before the town 's magistrates in december . mr morrison suffered head injuries in the incident which occurred in the beer garden at the wetherspoons royal baths pub on parliament street at around 19:30 gmt . a 43-year-old man from the york area also required treatment for facial injuries during the incident .

xsum.src: the child was critically injured in the incident and later died in hospital . the freak accident happened at 15:00 local time -lrb- 19:00 gmt -rrb- on friday . the sun dial restaurant , where the incident took place , has reportedly been closed until further notice . according to a statement from atlanta police , the restaurant 's revolving floor automatically stopped moving when the child became stuck on friday . employees managed to dislodge the boy , who suffered crushing injuries to his head and brain , according to a report by the fulton county medical examiner . `` the kid was just wandering as kids will do . somehow he found himself in a critical situation where he 's lodged in between the rotating floor and the wall , '' police spokesman warren pickard told reporters on saturday . the boy 's death has been ruled accidental . the restaurant is located at the top of the westin hotel , an atlanta attraction that offers a 360-degree view of the city .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 周五，一名五岁男孩被困在日晷餐厅的旋转地板上，头部严重受伤，在医院死亡。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 一名儿童在一起意外事故中受重伤，后来在医院不治身亡。这起事故发生在当地时间15:00（格林威治时间19:00）的星期五。据报道，事故发生的太阳表餐厅已经暂时关闭。根据亚特兰大警方的声明，星期五当孩子被卡住时，餐厅的旋转地板自动停止运动。据富尔顿县医学检查官的报告，员工们设法解救了这名男孩，但他的头部和脑部受到了压伤。警方发言人沃伦·皮卡德在周六告诉记者：“孩子只是像孩子一样漫步。不知怎么的，他发现自己处于一个危险的境地，被夹在旋转地板和墙壁之间。”男孩的死亡被认定为意外。这家餐厅位于威斯汀酒店的顶楼，是亚特兰大的一个景点，可以欣赏到城市的360度全景。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 一名孩子在亚特兰大一家餐厅发生意外，被卡在旋转地板上，后因受伤死亡。事发当地时间星期五下午3点，餐厅已关闭。警方表示孩子无意中被卡住，员工及时解救，但孩子头部和脑部受伤严重。餐厅位于威斯汀酒店顶层，提供全景城市景观。

xsum.src: eight of the accused , all senior managers , are charged with murder over the soma coalmine tragedy in western turkey last year . the trial was adjourned until wednesday because the court said the accused must testify in person , not via video link . an underground fire sent deadly carbon monoxide through the mine . an inquiry criticised the mine 's safety measures . it was modern turkey 's worst industrial accident . the trial at akhisar , about 50km -lrb- 30 miles -rrb- from soma , drew several hundred angry relatives to the special tribunal , but police prevented them from getting in . the bbc 's turkey correspondent mark lowen says the government is shielding state officials from any investigation , despite claims that they were aware of safety deficiencies at the mine but failed to act . the managers facing murder charges could be given up to 25 years in prison . protests broke out after last year 's disaster , fuelled by an apparently insensitive comment by president recep tayyip erdogan , who was prime minister at the time . he said accidents were `` in the nature of the business '' . the international labour organisation says turkey has the third-highest rate of workplace accidents in the world .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 土耳其将于周三对八名高级管理人员进行审判，罪名是造成去年西部索马煤矿安全事故，导致多人死亡。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 去年在土耳其西部索马煤矿发生的悲剧中，八名高级经理被控谋杀罪。由于法院要求被告必须亲自出庭作证，而不是通过视频链接，审判被推迟到周三。一场地下火灾导致有毒的一氧化碳在矿井中蔓延，调查指责矿井的安全措施不足。这是现代土耳其最严重的工业事故。在阿克希萨尔举行的审判吸引了数百名愤怒的亲属，但警方阻止他们进入。BBC土耳其记者马克·洛文说，尽管有人声称政府知道矿井的安全缺陷，但政府仍在保护国家官员不受调查。面临谋杀指控的经理可能被判最高25年监禁。去年事故后爆发了抗议活动，受到总统雷杰普·塔伊普·埃尔多安（当时是总理）一句不敏感的评论的推动，他说事故是“业务性质”。国际劳工组织称，土耳其是世界上工作场所事故率第三高的国家。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 土耳其索马煤矿火灾案件开庭，8名高级经理被控谋杀。调查指出矿井安全措施不足，是土耳其现代最严重的工业事故。政府被指掩盖官员责任，总统埃尔多安的言论引发抗议。审判推迟至星期三，被告经理可能被判监禁。土耳其高工作场所事故率居世界第三。

xsum.src: mother-of-two tracy kearns , 43 , of kinmel bay , has not been seen since about 20:00 bst on 7 may . on thursday , a 48-year-old man , who police said was known to ms kearns , was arrested on suspicion of murder in connection with her disappearance . police said specialist searches were focused on land alongside tir prince leisure park and extensive searches were ongoing in kinmel bay and towyn . ms kearns is described as 5ft 3ins -lrb- 1.6 m -rrb- tall with sandy coloured shoulder-length hair . supt sian beck , from north wales police , said : `` we are still trying to find tracy . `` officers are carrying out house to house inquiries , speaking to local people who may have information . ''

xsum.src: south wales fire and rescue service put out the blaze at alexandra docks which came after 20,000 tonnes of wood caught alight on 5 december . the service said four appliances , an aerial platform , two water tankers and a pump had to be sent on monday after it burst into a fresh blaze . the fire was eventually was brought under control at about 17:30 gmt . six crews remain at the scene damping down . the fire had been smoking since it started 16 days ago , with natural resources wales saying on 10 december it could continue to smoulder for `` weeks '' .
xsum.element-aware_summary: 12月5日，亚历山大港(Alexandria Dock)的大火被南威尔士消防救援队(South Wales Fire and Rescue)扑灭，但周一又再次爆发。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 南威尔士消防和救援服务在12月5日扑灭了亚历山德拉码头的大火，这场大火是由于2万吨木材起火引发的。消防部门表示，周一不得不派出四辆消防车、一辆高空平台、两辆水罐车和一辆泵车，才最终将大火控制在格林威治标准时间下午5:30左右。目前仍有六个消防队伍在现场进行抑制。这场大火自16天前开始冒烟，自然资源威尔士部门在12月10日表示，可能会持续“数周”。
xsum.gpt3_cot_summary: 南威尔士消防和救援服务在12月5日控制了亚历山德拉码头发生的火灾，但在12月16日，火灾突然再次爆发。经过16天的努力，火灾最终被控制，消防队员仍在现场进行抑制工作。威尔士自然资源表示，火灾可能持续冒烟数周。

xsum.src: the one-year-old was handed in to the dogs trust near darlington in december after being found wandering the streets as a stray . following an appeal on social media , the canine with `` a heart of gold '' has found a new forever family . the trust said fester would be leaving the charity 's kennels early next week . fester was born with a narrow jaw which causes his lower teeth to stick out - creating some `` unique features '' , a trust spokeswoman said . `` we were concerned that fun-loving fester may have ended up being over-looked by potential new owners due to his unusual eye-catching appearance , '' she added . `` he is a gorgeous boy with an amazing character , so we could n't imagine why anyone would n't want to have him as part of their family . `` he 's had a rough time and it is fantastic news he will have a new home where he can settle and hopefully his character will shine through . ''
xsum.element-aware_summary: 去年12月，这只丑陋的一岁流浪狗被带到达灵顿附近的一个狗信托基金，由一个新家庭收养。
xsum.gpt3_summary: 一岁的小狗在去年12月被送到达林顿附近的狗狗信托组织，因为被发现在街上流浪。经过在社交媒体上的呼吁，这只“心地善良”的小狗已经找到了新的永久家庭。信托组织表示，Fester将在下周早些时候离开慈善机构的狗舍。Fester出生时有一个狭窄的下颌，导致他的下牙突出，创造出一些“独特的特征”，信托组织的发言人说。她补充说：“我们担心，因为他不寻常的吸引人的外表，充满乐趣的Fester可能会被潜在的新主人忽视。”她说：“他是一个美丽的男孩，有着惊人的性格，所以我们无法想象为什么有人不想把他作为家庭的一部分。”“他经历了艰难的时期，能够有一个新家，让他安顿下来，希望他的性格能够展现出来，这是一个很棒的消息。”
